    16                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    17                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    18                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    19                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    20                                        
    21                                  ;------ Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    22                                  ;	at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    23                                  ;	moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    24                                  ;	Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    25                                  ;	SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    26                                  ;	(MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    27                                  
    28                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    29                                  
    30                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    31                                  ;
    32                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    33                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    34                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    35                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    36                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    37                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    38                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    39                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    40                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    41                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    42                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    43                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;
    47                                  ;bpbx		ends

   142                                  ;============================================================================
   143                                  ;
   144                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   145                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   146                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   147                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   148                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   149                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   150                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   151                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   152                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the
   153                                  ;	     extention of msboot program.

   253                                  ;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from

   255                                  ;   bx = first data sector (low) on disk (0-based)
   256                                  ;   ds:si = original rom bios diskette parameter table.
   257                                  ;
   258                                  ; if an extended boot record, then ax will be the first data sector
   259                                  ; high word. save ax and set FirstSectorH according to ax if it is an

   264                                  ;

   270                                  ;   FirstSectorH = input AX, if an extended boot record.;j.k.
   271                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.
   272                                  ;   TotalSectorsH = high word of the above

   492                                  ; Relocate
   493                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   494                                  ;
   495                                  ; NOTES:
   496                                  ;
   497                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   498                                  ;
   499                                  ; INPUT:     none
   500                                  ;
   501                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   502                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   503                                  ;
   504                                  ; calls:     none
   505                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   506                                  ;
   507                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   508                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   509                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   510                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   511                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   512                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   513                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   514                                  ;
   515                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   516                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   517                                  ;
   518                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; jump to relocated code
   521                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   522                                  
   523                                  		; 14/09/2023
   524                                  relocate:
   525                                  		; 24/12/2022
   526                                  		;cld
   527                                  
   528 000000C6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
   529                                  		; 14/09/2023
   530                                  		;mov	di, si
   531                                  		; di = 0
   532                                  
   533 000000C8 CD12                    		int	12h		; MEMORY SIZE -
   534                                  					; Return: AX = number of contiguous 1K blocks of memory
   535 000000CA B106                    		mov	cl, 6
   536 000000CC D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl		; Memory size in paragraphs
   537                                  
   538                                  ;------ Check if an RPL program is present at TOM and do not tromp over it
   539                                  
   540                                  		; 10/12/2022
   541                                  		; ds = 0
   542                                  		; 24/12/2022
   543                                  		; ds = cs
   544                                  		;xor	bx, bx
   545                                  		;mov	ds, bx		; ZERO
   546                                  		; 14/09/2023
   547 000000CE 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si ; 0
   548                                  		
   549                                  		;mov	bx, [DskAddr+44h] ; 2Fh*4 (Int 2Fh)
   550                                  		;mov	ds, [DskAddr+46h] ; 2Fh*4+2
   551                                  		; 10/12/2022

   553 000000D4 8E1EBE00                		mov	ds, [2Fh*4+2]		
   554                                  
   555                                  		;cmp	word ptr [bx+3], 'PR'

   560 000000E3 7509                    		jnz	short Skip_RPL
   561 000000E5 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; get TOM into DX
   562 000000E7 B8064A                  		mov	ax, 4A06h	; (multMULT shl	8) + multMULTRPLTOM
   563 000000EA CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; Get new TOM from any RPL
   564 000000EC 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
   565                                  Skip_RPL:
   566                                  		; 24/12/2022

   568 000000EF 1F                      		pop	ds	; 25/12/2022
   569

   571 000000F2 8B16[1000]              		mov	dx, [BytesPerSec] ; 24/12/2022
   572                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
   573 000000F6 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl
   574 000000F8 42                      		inc	dx
   575 000000F9 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
   576 000000FB A3[3200]                		mov	[FatSegment], ax ; 24/12/2022
   577                                  		;mov	[cs:FatSegment], ax ; This will be used for fat sector
   578                                  		; 22/12/2022
   579                                  		;mov	dx, EndOfLoader
   580 000000FE BA[9004]                		mov	dx, EndOfLoader+256
   581                                  				; loader size + temporary/local stack space (*)
   582 00000101 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl
   583 00000103 42                      		inc	dx
   584 00000104 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
   585 00000106 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax	; ES:DI -> place be relocated.
   586                                  		; 22/12/2022
   587 00000108 4A                      		dec	dx
   588 00000109 D3E2                    		shl	dx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes (*)	
   589                                  				; (stack pointer will be set to this offset)
   590                                  		; 24/12/2022
   591                                  		;push	cs

   600 00000115 CB                      		retf

   633                                  ; FindClusterSize
   634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   635                                  ;
   636                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   637                                  ;
   638                                  ; OUTPUT:
   639                                  ;
   640                                  ;	ds = 0
   641                                  ;	ax = bytes/cluster
   642                                  ;	bx = sectors/cluster
   643                                  ;	si destroyed
   644                                  ; calls:     none
   645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   646                                  ;
   647                                  ; get bytes/sector from bpb
   648                                  ;
   649                                  ; get sectors/cluster from bpb
   650                                  ;
   651                                  ; bytes/cluster = bytes/sector * sector/cluster
   652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   653                                  
   654                                  FindClusterSize:
   655

   673                                  ; CalcFatSize
   674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   675                                  ;
   676                                  ; NOTES:
   677                                  ;
   678                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   679                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   680                                  ;
   681                                  ; INPUT:
   682                                  ;
   683                                  ; OUTPUT:
   684                                  ;
   685                                  ;   CS:FatSize = FAT_12_BIT or FAT_16_BIT
   686                                  ;   all other registers destroyed
   687                                  ;
   688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   689                                  
   690                                  CalcFatSize:
   691                                  		; 14/09/2023

   694 0000012A C606[2700]01            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 1
   695                                  		;mov	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1 ; FAT_12_BIT (assume)

   698 0000012F 8B16[2000]              		mov	dx, [TotalSectorsH]

   700                                  		;;;

   748 0000015D C606[2700]04            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 4 ; FAT_16_BIT
   749                                  
   750                                  ; ReadInFirstClusters
   751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   752                                  ;
   753                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   754                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   755                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   756                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   757                                  ;
   758                                  ; INPUT:
   759                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   760                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   761                                  ;
   762                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   763                                  ;   ClusterSize
   764                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   765                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   766                                  ;
   767                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   768                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   769                                  ;
   770                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   771                                  ; logic:
   772                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   773                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   774                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   775                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   776                                  ;	read in so far.
   777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   778                                  
   779                                  ; 09/12/2022
   780                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   781                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   782                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   783                                  	
   784                                  ReadInFirstClusters:
   785                                  		; 24/12/2022
   786                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   787                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   788                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   789                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   790                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2
   791                                  		;;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax ;  Initialize to this cluster
   792                                  		; 24/12/2022
   793                                  		; ds = cs
   794                                  		;mov	[CurrentCluster], ax
   795                                  		; 24/12/2022
   796                                  		; [CurrentCluster] = word [51Ah] - 2
   797                                  
   798                                  		;mov	ax, IbmLoadSize
   799 00000162 B80300                  		mov	ax, 3		; Load the 3rd and other IO.SYS	sectors
   800 00000165 F6F1                    		div	cl ; *#*
   801                                  		;div	byte [SecPerCluster]
   802                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   803                                  					; AL = total cluster read in
   804                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   805                                  		; 10/12/2022
   806 00000167 20E4                    		and	ah, ah
   807                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   808 00000169 7433                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   809                                  
   810 0000016B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
   811 0000016D 50                      		push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   812                                  					; already read in
   813                                  ; 24/12/2022
   814                                  %if 0		
   815                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorL] ;	Put starting sector of disk data
   816                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   817                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   818                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx
   819                                  		mul	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   820                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   821                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   822                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   823                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   824                                  		dec	ax
   825                                  		dec	ax

   845                                  		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader

   848                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clusters read in based 2

   850                                  		dec	ax		; CurrentCluster = Last	cluster	read

   860                                  		; [StartSecH] = [FirstSectorH] ; **!**

   901 0000019C 58                      		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   902 0000019D 40                      		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   903                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...
   904 0000019E 40                      		inc	ax		; AX = total clusters read in based 2

   907                                  					; AX = number of clusters loaded
   908                                  		
   909                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   910                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   911                                  ;
   912                                  ; NOTES:
   913                                  ;
   914                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   915                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   916                                  ;
   917                                  ; INPUT:
   918                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   919                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   920                                  ;
   921                                  ; OUTPUT:
   922                                  ;	ES = 70h
   923                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
   924                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
   925                                  ;
   926                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
   927                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
   928                                  ;
   929                                  ; calls:     none
   930                                  ;
   931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   932                                  ;
   933                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
   934                                  ;
   935                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
   936                                  ;
   937                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
   938                                  ;
   939                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   940                                  
   941                                  SaveLoadedBios:
   942 000001A4 1E                      		push	ds
   943                                  		; 24/12/2022
   944                                  		; ds = cs
   945                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
   946 000001A5 F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
   947                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
   948                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
   949                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
   950                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
   951                                  
   952 000001A9 2D[9003]                		sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
   953 000001AC 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
   954 000001AE B87000                  		mov	ax, 70h		; Segment at 70h

   967                                  ; GetContigClusters
   968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   969                                  ;
   970                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
   971                                  ;
   972                                  ;
   973                                  ; INPUT:
   974                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
   975                                  ;   CS:
   976                                  ;
   977                                  ; OUTPUT:
   978                                  ;
   979                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
   980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   981                                  ;
   982                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
   983                                  ;
   984                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
   985                                  ;
   986                                  ;Call check_for_eof
   987                                  ;
   988                                  ;if (nc returned)
   989                                  ;
   990                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
   991                                  ;
   992                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
   993                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
   994                                  ;
   995                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
   996                                  ;
   997                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
   998                                  ;
   999                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1000                                  
  1001                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1002                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1003                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
  1004                                  
  1005                                  GetContigClusters:
  1006                                  
  1007                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1008                                  %if 0	
  1009                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1010                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1011                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1012                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1013                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1014                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1015                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1016                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1017                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1018                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1019                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1020                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1021                                  		dec	ax
  1022                                  		dec	ax
  1023                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1024                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1025                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1026                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1027                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1028                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1029                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1030                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1031                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1032                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1033                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1034                                  		mov	es, ax
  1035                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1036                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1037                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1038                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1039                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1040                                  
  1041                                  %endif
  1042                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1043                                  		; ds = cs
  1044                                  
  1045 000001BD A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1046 000001C0 A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1047                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1048 000001C3 50                      		push	ax
  1049 000001C4 E8AF00                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1050 000001C7 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]
  1051 000001CB A3[0E00]                		mov	[CurrentCluster], ax	; Update the last one found
  1052

  1054 000001D3 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022

  1060 000001D6 48                      		dec	ax

  1066 000001DB 0306[2200]              		add	ax, [FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts

  1078                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1079                                  
  1080                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1081                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1082                                  ;
  1083                                  ; NOTES:
  1084                                  ;
  1085                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1086                                  ;
  1087                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1088                                  ;
  1089                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1090                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1091                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1092                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1093                                  ;
  1094                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1095                                  ;
  1096                                  ;   required by msinit
  1097                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1098                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1099                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1100                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1101                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1102                                  ;
  1103                                  ; calls:     none
  1104                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1105                                  ;
  1106                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1107                                  ;
  1108                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1109                                  
  1110                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1111                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1112                                  		; ds = cs

  1114                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1115                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1116                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1117                                  
  1118 000001EF 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1119 000001F3 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1120 000001F7 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1121 000001FB A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1122                                  
  1123                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1124                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1125                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1126                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1127                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1128                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1129                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1130                                  		;
  1131                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1132                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1133                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1134                                  		;
  1135                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1136                                  
  1137 000001FE EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1138                                  
  1139                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1140                                  
  1141                                  ; ReadSectors
  1142                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1143                                  ; notES:
  1144                                  ;
  1145                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1146                                  ;
  1147                                  ;
  1148                                  ; INPUT:
  1149                                  ;
  1150                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1151                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1152                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1153                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1154                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1155                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1156                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1157                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1158                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1159                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1160                                  ;
  1161                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1162                                  ;
  1163                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1165                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1166                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1167                                  ;
  1168                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1169                                  ;
  1170                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1171                                  ;
  1172                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1173                                  ;
  1174                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1175                                  ;
  1176                                  ; do the read
  1177                                  ;
  1178                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1179                                  ;
  1180                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1181                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1182                                  ;
  1183                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1185                                  
  1186                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1187                                  ReadSectors:
  1188                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1189                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1190                                  ReadSectors:

  1243                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1244                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1245                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1246                                  %if 0
  1247                                  		; 24/12/2022

  1250                                  		or	di, di

  1253                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1254                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1255                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1256                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1257                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1258                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1259                                  		push	dx
  1260                                  		push	ax
  1261                                  		mov	ax, si

  1263                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1264                                  		mov	bx, es

  1279                                  %endif

  1417                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1418                                  
  1419                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1420                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1421                                  ;
  1422                                  ; NOTES:
  1423                                  ;
  1424                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1425                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1426                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1427                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1428                                  ;
  1429                                  ; INPUT:
  1430                                  ;
  1431                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1432                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1433                                  ;
  1434                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1435                                  ;
  1436                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1437                                  ;
  1438                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1439                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1440                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1441                                  ;
  1442                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1443                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1444                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1445                                  ;     else
  1446                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1447                                  ;
  1448                                  ; else
  1449                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1450                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1451                                  ;     else
  1452                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1453                                  ;
  1454                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1455                                  ;
  1456                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1457                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1458                                  ;
  1459                                  ;	 else
  1460                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1461                                  ;	}
  1462                                  ;    }
  1463                                  ;
  1464                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1465                                  
  1466                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1467                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1468                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1469                                  
  1470                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1471 00000276 06                      		push	es
  1472                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1473                                  		; ds = cs
  1474                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1475 00000277 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1476 0000027A 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1477                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1478                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1479                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1480                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1481                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1482                                  		; ds = cs
  1483 0000027C C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1484 00000281 A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1485 00000284 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1486                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1487                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1488 00000289 7537                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1489 0000028B 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1490 0000028D D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1491 0000028F 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1492                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1493                                  		;push	dx
  1494                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1495 00000291 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1496 00000293 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1497                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1498                                  		;pop	dx
  1499 00000296 7510                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1500 00000298 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1501                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1502                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1503                                  		;push	ax ; (*)
  1504 0000029B 46                      		inc	si
  1505                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1506                                  		;push	dx
  1507 0000029C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1508 0000029E E83C00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1509                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1510                                  		;pop	dx
  1511                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1512                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1513                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1514                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1515                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1516                                  		;pop	ax ; (*) 
  1517 000002A1 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1518 000002A6 EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1519                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1520                                  
  1521                                  ClusterOk:				
  1522 000002A8 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1523                                  EvenOdd:	
  1524                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1525                                  		; ds = cs
  1526 000002AB F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1527                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1528                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1529                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1530 000002B0 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1531 000002B2 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1532 000002B5 EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1534                                  
  1535                                  OddResult:				
  1536 000002B7 B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1537 000002B9 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1538                                  TestEOF:				
  1539 000002BB 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1540 000002BE 731B                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1541 000002C0 EB14                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1543                                  
  1544                                  Got16Bit:
  1545                                  		; 23/12/2022				
  1546                                  		;push	dx
  1547                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1548 000002C2 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1549 000002C4 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1550 000002C6 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  1551 000002C9 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1552 000002CB E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1553                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1554                                  		;pop	dx
  1555 000002CE 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1556 000002D1 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1557 000002D4 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1558                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1559                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1560                                  		; ds = cs			
  1561                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1562                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1563 000002D6 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1564                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1565 000002DB 07                      		pop	es
  1566                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1567                                  EndRead:
  1568 000002DC C3                      		retn
  1569                                  
  1570                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1571                                  
  1572                                  ; GetFatSector
  1573                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1574                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1575                                  ;
  1576                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1577                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1578                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1579                                  ;
  1580                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1581                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1582                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1583                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1584                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1585                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1586                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1587                                  ;
  1588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1589                                  
  1590                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1591                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1592                                  GetFatSector:
  1593 000002DD 50                      		push	ax
  1594 000002DE 56                      		push	si
  1595 000002DF 57                      		push	di
  1596 000002E0 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1597                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1598                                  		; ds = cs
  1599                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1600                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1601 000002E2 F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1602 000002E6 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1603                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1604 000002EA 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1605 000002EC A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1606                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1607 000002EF 52                      		push	dx
  1608                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1609 000002F0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1610                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1611                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1612                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1613                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1614                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1615                                  		; ds = cs
  1616 000002F2 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1617 000002F6 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1618 000002FA A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1619 000002FD 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1620                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1621                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1622                                  		
  1623 00000301 C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector			
  1624                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1625 00000307 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1626                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1627 00000309 E8F7FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1628 0000030C 5A                      		pop	dx
  1629                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1630                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1631                                  SplitChk:
  1632                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1633 0000030D 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]				
  1634 00000311 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1635 00000312 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1636 00000314 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1637 00000316 5F                      		pop	di
  1638 00000317 5E                      		pop	si
  1639 00000318 58                      		pop	ax
  1640                                  EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1641 00000319 C3                      		retn
  1642                                  
  1643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1644                                  
  1645                                  ErrorOut:
  1646                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1647                                  		; ds = cs
  1648                                  		;push	cs
  1649                                  		;pop	ds
  1650                                  		
  1651 0000031A BE[4103]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...
  1652 0000031D E81400                  		call	WriteTTY
  1653                                  
  1654                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1655                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1656                                  
  1657 00000320 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1658 00000322 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1659                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1660                                  
  1661                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1662                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1663                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1664                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1665                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1666                                  		; loader bios interrupt.
  1667                                  
  1668                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1669                                  		;xor	bx, bx
  1670                                  		;mov	ds, bx
  1671                                  		;les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Wrong DS segment !
  1672                                  					 ; (Erdogan Tan, 23/12/2022)
  1673 00000324 C41E[2A00]              		les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Correct DS segment = CS
  1674                                  		
  1675                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1676 00000328 16                      		push	ss ; 0
  1677 00000329 1F                      		pop	ds
  1678                                  		; ds = 0		
  1679                                  
  1680 0000032A BE7800                  		mov	si, DskAddr	; (Int 1Eh)
  1681 0000032D 891C                    		mov	[si], bx	; restore offset		
  1682 0000032F 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1683 00000332 CD19                    		int	19h		; reboot
  1684                                  
  1685                                  
  1686                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1687                                  
  1688                                  ; WriteTTY
  1689                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1690                                  ; in) DS:si -> asciiz string.
  1691                                  ;
  1692                                  ; WriteTTY the character in al to the screen.
  1693                                  ; use video service 'write teletype to active page' (ROM_TTY)
  1694                                  ; use normal character attribute
  1695                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1696                                  
  1697                                  WriteTTY:
  1698 00000334 AC                      		lodsb
  1699 00000335 08C0                    		or	al, al
  1700 00000337 74E0                    		jz	short EndWrite
  1701                                  		;mov	AH, ROM_TTY	; 09/12/2022
  1702 00000339 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  1703 0000033B B307                    		mov	bl, 7		; "normal" attribute
  1704 0000033D CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  1705                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  1706                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  1707 0000033F EBF3                    		jmp	short WriteTTY
  1708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1709                                  
  1710                                  ; 10/12/2022	
  1711                                  ;EndWrite:
  1712                                  ;		retn
  1713

  1751 00000003 0000                    DosDataSg:	dw 0

  1753                                  ; DOS's int 2f handler will exit via a jump through here.
  1754                                  ; This is how the BIOS hooks int2f

  1762                                  					; with DISK based DOS 5.0

  1764                                  ; This is a byte used for special key handling in the resident
  1765                                  ; console device driver. It must be here so that it can be included
  1766                                  ; in the WIN386 instance table (in INC\LMSTUB.ASM).

  1777                                  ; puts the address of the Request header in this variable and returns.

  1914 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  1915 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1916                                  
  1917                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  1918                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  1919                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  1920                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  1921                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  1922                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  1923                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  1924                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  1925                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  1926                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  1927                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  1928                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  1929                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  1930                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  1931                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  1932                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  1933                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  1934                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  1935                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  1936                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  1937                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  1938                                  
  1939 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  1940 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  1941 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  1942                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  1943 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  1944 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  1945 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  1946 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  1947 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  1948                                  
  1949                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  1950                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  1951                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  1952                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  1953                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  1954                                  ; algorithm is used:
  1955                                  ;
  1956                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  1957                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  1958                                  ;	set slow = 15
  1959                                  ;   else
  1960                                  ;	set slow = value
  1961                                  ;   ...
  1962                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  1963                                  ;	use slow
  1964                                  ;   else
  1965                                  ;	use fast
  1966                                  ;   ...
  1967                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  1968                                  
  1969 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  1970 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  1971 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  1972 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  1973 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  1974 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  1975 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  1976 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  1977 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  1978 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  1979 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  1980 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  1981 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  1982 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  1983 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  1984 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  1985

  2020                                  ; in them which causes the byte after the buffer to be trashed
  2021                                  ; on floppy reads to odd-byte boundaries. Although no general effort 
  2022                                  ; is made to enforce this in the bigger picture, this one small sacrifice
  2023                                  ; makes that system more-or-less work.

  2038                                  ;	the bpb has not been filled. link also set to -1 to signify end
  2039                                  ;	of list. # of cylinders in maxparms initialized to -1 to indicate
  2040                                  ;	that the parameters have not been set.

  2240                                  ; the one passed by "new roms" before we perform a format operation. the old
  2241                                  ; dpt is restored in restoreolddpt. the first entry (disk_specify_1) is -1 if
  2242                                  ; this table does not contain the previously saved dpt.

  2351                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 - IO.SYS (MSDOS v5.0)
  2352                                  ; BIOSCODE_SEGMENT equ 2C7h
  2353                                  ; BIOSDATA_SEGMENT equ 70h ; KERNEL_SEGMENT equ 70h
  2354                                  
  2355                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2356                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed function/routine
  2357                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)

  2360                                  %if 0
  2361                                  cdev:		dw 43h,	2C7h		; chardev_entry
  2362                                  					; at 2C7h:43h =	70h:25B3h
  2363                                  ttticks:	dw 396h, 2C7h		; time_to_ticks
  2364                                  					; at 2C7h:396h = 70h:2906h
  2365                                  bcode_i2f:	dw 1302h, 2C7h		; i2f_handler
  2366                                  					; at 2C7h:1302h	= 70h:3872h
  2367                                  i13x:		dw 154Bh, 2C7h		; i13z
  2368                                  					; at 2C7h:154Bh	= 70h:3ABBh
  2369                                  %endif

  2372 000006DE [4300]B302              cdev:		dw chardev_entry, IOSYSCODESEG
  2373 000006E2 [8B03]B302              ttticks:	dw time_to_ticks, IOSYSCODESEG
  2374 000006E6 [A512]B302              bcode_i2f:	dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG
  2375 000006EA [D014]B302              i13x:		dw i13z, IOSYSCODESEG
  2376

  2378                                  
  2379                                  ;************************************************************************
  2380                                  ;*									*
  2381                                  ;*	cbreak - break key handling - simply set altah=3 and iret	*
  2382                                  ;*									*
  2383                                  ;************************************************************************
  2384                                  
  2385                                  cbreak:					
  2386 000006EE 2EC606[0C00]03          		mov	byte [cs:altah], 3 ; break key handling
  2387                                  					; indicate break key set
  2388                                  intret:

  2392                                  
  2393                                  
  2394                                  ;************************************************************************
  2395                                  ;*									*
  2396                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2397                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2398                                  ;*									*
  2399                                  ;************************************************************************
  2400                                  
  2401                                  strategy:	; proc far		
  2402 000006F5 2E891E[1200]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav], bx ; store es:bx (device driver request packet)
  2403                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2404 000006FA 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2405 000006FF CB                      		retf
  2406                                  
  2407                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2408                                  
  2409                                  ;************************************************************************
  2410                                  ;*									*
  2411                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2412                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2413                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2414                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2415                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2416                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2417                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2418                                  ;*									*
  2419                                  ;************************************************************************
  2420                                  
  2421                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2422                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2423                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2424                                  
  2425                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2426                                  
  2427                                  con_entry:				
  2428 00000700 E84000                  		call	cdev_entry
  2429                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2430                                  		;dw 0E4h		; con_table
  2431 00000703 [E300]                  		dw con_table	
  2432                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  2433                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2434                                  
  2435                                  prn0_entry:				
  2436 00000705 E83B00                  		call	cdev_entry
  2437                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2438                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2439 00000708 [FA00]                  		dw prn_table
  2440                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2441 0000070A 0000                    		db 0, 0
  2442                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2443                                  
  2444                                  prn1_entry:				
  2445 0000070C E83400                  		call	cdev_entry
  2446                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2447                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2448 0000070F [FA00]                  		dw prn_table
  2449                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2450 00000711 0001                    		db 0, 1
  2451                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2452                                  
  2453                                  prn2_entry:				
  2454 00000713 E82D00                  		call	cdev_entry
  2455                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2456                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2457 00000716 [FA00]                  		dw prn_table
  2458                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2459 00000718 0102                    		db 1, 2
  2460                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2461                                  
  2462                                  prn3_entry:				
  2463 0000071A E82600                  		call	cdev_entry
  2464                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2465                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2466 0000071D [FA00]                  		dw prn_table
  2467                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2468 0000071F 0203                    		db 2, 3

  2470

  2474                                  		;dw 130h		; aux_table
  2475 00000724 [2F01]                  		dw aux_table
  2476                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  2477 00000726 00                      		db 0
  2478                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2479                                  
  2480                                  aux1_entry:				
  2481 00000727 E81900                  		call	cdev_entry
  2482                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2483                                  		;dw 130h		; aux_table
  2484 0000072A [2F01]                  		dw aux_table
  2485                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  2486 0000072C 01                      		db 1

  2493 00000730 [2F01]                  		dw aux_table
  2494                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  2495 00000732 02                      		db 2
  2496                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2497                                  
  2498                                  aux3_entry:				
  2499 00000733 E80D00                  		call	cdev_entry
  2500                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2501                                  		;dw 130h		; aux_table
  2502 00000736 [2F01]                  		dw aux_table
  2503                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  2504 00000738 03                      		db 3

  2515                                  ; 15/10/2022
  2516                                  ;DSKTBL	equ dsktbl - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; dsktbl - 2C70h
  2517                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2518                                  DSKTBL equ dsktbl
  2519

  2522                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
