  5811                                  
  5812                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  5813                                  ;
  5814                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  5815                                  
  5816                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  5817                                  
  5818                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5819                                  ; module name: remap
  5820                                  ;
  5821                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  5822                                  ;
  5823                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  5824                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  5825                                  ;
  5826                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  5827                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  5828                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5829                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5830                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5831                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  5832                                  
  5833                                  ; input:       none
  5834                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  5835                                  ; exit error:  none
  5836                                  ; called from: msinit
  5837                                  ;
  5838                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  5839                                  ;	  found in the system
  5840                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  5841                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  5842                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  5843                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  5844                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  5845                                  ;
  5846                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5847                                  
  5848                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5849                                  ; 02/10/2022
  5850                                  
  5851                                  remap:		; proc near		
  5852 00001C6F 2E8B3E[1901]            		mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  5853                                  
  5854                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  5855                                  
  5856                                  drive_loop:				
  5857 00001C74 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5858                                  					; first	hard disk??
  5859 00001C78 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  5860 00001C7A 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5861                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  5862 00001C7C 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1		; last bds?
  5863 00001C7F 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  5864 00001C81 EB4F                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  5865                                  
  5866                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5867                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  5868                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  5869                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5870                                  
  5871                                  fdrv_found:				
  5872 00001C83 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  5873                                  fdrv_loop:				
  5874 00001C85 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5875                                  					; found	??
  5876 00001C88 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5877                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  5878                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  5879                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5880 00001C8A 40                      		inc	ax
  5881 00001C8B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ??
  5882 00001C8E 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk	drives
  5883                                  
  5884                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5885                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  5886                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  5887                                  ; any more.
  5888                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5889                                  
  5890 00001C90 2E8B3E[1901]            		mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  5891                                  					; get first bds
  5892 00001C95 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5893                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  5894 00001C97 2E8A26[2501]            		mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  5895 00001C9C 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  5896                                  remap_loop1:				
  5897 00001C9F 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5898                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  5899 00001CA1 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5900 00001CA4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  5901 00001CA6 FECC                    		dec	ah		; count	down extra floppies
  5902 00001CA8 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  5903                                  
  5904                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  5905                                  
  5906 00001CAA 2EA0[CA16]              		mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  5907 00001CAE 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  5908 00001CB0 7220                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  5909 00001CB2 2E2A06[2501]            		sub	al, [cs:dsktnum] ; is it one of the other floppies?
  5910 00001CB7 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  5911                                  
  5912                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  5913                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  5914                                  
  5915 00001CB9 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  5916 00001CBB EB05                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  5917                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5918                                  
  5919                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  5920                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  5921                                  
  5922                                  remap_boot_flop:			
  5923 00001CBD 2E0206[7500]            		add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  5924                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  5925 00001CC2 2EA2[CA16]              		mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  5926 00001CC6 FEC0                    		inc	al
  5927 00001CC8 1E                      		push	ds
  5928 00001CC9 BF5004                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5929                                  		;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  5930 00001CCC 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  5931 00001CCE A2[9602]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  5932                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  5933                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  5934 00001CD1 1F                      		pop	ds
  5935                                  rmap_exit:				
  5936 00001CD2 C3                      		retn
  5937                                  
  5938                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5939                                  
  5940                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5941                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  5942                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  5943                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  5944                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  5945                                  ;**************************************************
  5946                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  5947                                  ;
  5948                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  5949                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  5950                                  ;
  5951                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  5952                                  ;**************************************************
  5953                                  
  5954                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5955                                  bootbias equ 200h
  5956                                  
  5957                                  getboot:	; proc near		
  5958                                  		
  5959                                  		; 08/04/2018
  5960                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  5961                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  5962                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  5963                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  5964                                  
  5965 00001CD3 2EA1[D516]              		mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  5966 00001CD7 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  5967                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5968 00001CD9 BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  5969                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  5970                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  5971 00001CDC B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  5972 00001CDF 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  5973 00001CE1 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  5974 00001CE4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  5975                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  5976                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  5977                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  5978 00001CE6 7209                    		jb	short erret
  5979                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5980 00001CE8 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  5981                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  5982                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  5983 00001CEF 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  5984                                  erret:					
  5985 00001CF1 F9                      		stc
  5986                                  norm_ret:				
  5987 00001CF2 C3                      		retn
  5988                                  
  5989                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5990                                  
  5991                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  5992                                  
  5993                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5994                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  5995                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  5996                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  5997                                  ;   determine version number
  5998                                  ;
  5999                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  6000                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  6001                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  6002                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  6003                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  6004                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  6005                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  6006                                  ;***************************************************************************
  6007                                  
  6008                                  sethard:	; proc near		
  6009                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6010                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  6011 00001CF3 57                      		push	di
  6012 00001CF4 53                      		push	bx
  6013                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 14/08/2023
  6014 00001CF5 06                      		push	es
  6015 00001CF6 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6016 00001CF9 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6017 00001CFC 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6018                                  					; fnon_removable
  6019 00001D00 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6020                                  					; ffHardFile
  6021 00001D04 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  6022 00001D09 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  6023 00001D0B 52                      		push	dx
  6024 00001D0C B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6025 00001D0E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6026                                  					; DL = drive number
  6027                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6028                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6029                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6030 00001D10 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  6031 00001D12 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  6032 00001D15 5A                      		pop	dx
  6033 00001D16 7263                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  6034 00001D18 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  6035 00001D1B 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6036 00001D1E 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  6037 00001D1F E8B1FF                  		call	getboot
  6038 00001D22 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  6039 00001D23 7256                    		jb	short setret
  6040 00001D25 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6041                                  
  6042                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  6043                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  6044                                  
  6045                                  act_part:				
  6046 00001D28 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  6047 00001D2D 7418                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  6048 00001D2F 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  6049 00001D33 740C                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6050 00001D35 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6051 00001D39 7406                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6052 00001D3B 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6053 00001D3F 7506                    		jnz	short no_act
  6054                                  got_good_act:				
  6055 00001D41 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  6056 00001D43 743A                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  6057 00001D45 FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  6058                                  no_act:					
  6059 00001D47 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6060 00001D4A 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6061                                  					; last entry done?
  6062 00001D4E 75D8                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  6063 00001D50 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6064                                  					; restore original value of bx
  6065                                  
  6066                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  6067                                  
  6068                                  get_primary:

  6071                                  					; the ACTIVE ones

  6073 00001D5E 740C                    		jz	short got_prim
  6074 00001D60 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6075 00001D64 7406                    		jz	short got_prim
  6076 00001D66 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6077 00001D6A 7506                    		jnz	short not_prim

  6079 00001D6C 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  6080 00001D6E 740F                    		jz	short set2

  6084 00001D75 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6085 00001D79 75D8                    		jnz	short get_primary ; loop till we've gone through table
  6086                                  setret:					
  6087 00001D7B F9                      		stc			; error	return
  6088 00001D7C E9A002                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  6089                                  
  6090                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6091                                  
  6092                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  6093                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6094                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  6095                                  ;
  6096                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  6097                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  6098                                  ;  without change.
  6099                                  ;
  6100                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  6101                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  6102                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  6103

  6111 00001D87 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]

  6114                                  ; sectors should be allowed

  6171 00001DFC 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024
  6172 00001DFF 775A                    		ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  6173                                  			; Retro DOS v3.2 note by Erdogan Tan - 28/07/2019

  6176                                  okdrive_2:

  6220                                  					; into cs:disksector area.
  6221 00001E20 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h

  6223                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6224                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill

  6226

  6259 00001E43 813F0002                		cmp	word [bx], 512 ; 14/08/2023

  6261                                  
  6262                                  check2_ok:				; yes, mediadescriptor ok.
  6263 00001E49 8A4702                  		mov	al, [bx+2] ; 14/08/2023

  6265                                  					; the sectorspercluster	is

  6506                                  ; ****** cas ---
  6507                                  ; IBM DOS 3.30 doesn't seem to mind that the TOTAL_SECTORS and
  6508                                  ; BIG_TOTAL_SECTORS field in the boot sector are 0000. This
  6509                                  ; happens with some frequency -- perhaps through some OS/2 setup
  6510                                  ; program. We haven't actually been COPYING the TOTAL_SECTORS
  6511                                  ; from the boot sector into the DPB anyway, we've just been using
  6512                                  ; it for calculating the fat size. Pretty scary, huh? For now,
  6513                                  ; we'll go ahead and copy it into the DPB, except in the case
  6514                                  ; that it equals zero, in which case we just use the values in
  6515                                  ; the DPB from the partition table.

  6718                                  					; cl = log base 2 of ch

  6733                                  					; if (fbigfat)
  6734 00001FA5 751E                    		jnz	short dobig	; goto dobig; (16 bit fat)
  6735                                  
  6736                                  ; we don't need to change "small fat" logic since it is gauranteed
  6737                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  6738                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  6739                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!
  6740                                  
  6741 00001FA7 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; (12 bit fat)
  6742 00001FA9 88EB                    		mov	bl, ch
  6743 00001FAB 4B                      		dec	bx

  6746 00001FB0 43                      		inc	bx		; BDS.secperclus
  6747 00001FB1 80E3FE                  		and	bl, 0FEh	; bx &= ~1; (=number of clusters)
  6748 00001FB4 89DE                    		mov	si, bx

  6750 00001FB8 01F3                    		add	bx, si
  6751 00001FBA 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2
  6752 00001FBE D0EF                    		shr	bh, 1		; bh >>= 1; (=bx/512)
  6753 00001FC0 887D11                  		mov	[di+11h], bh	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6754                                  					; save number of fat sectors
  6755 00001FC3 EB35                    		jmp	short massage_bpb
  6756                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6757                                  
  6758                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6759                                  
  6760                                  dobig:					
  6761 00001FC5 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6762 00001FC7 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6763 00001FC8 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6764 00001FCB D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6765 00001FCD 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6766 00001FCF 5A                      		pop	dx
  6767 00001FD0 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6768 00001FD3 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6769 00001FD6 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6770                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6771 00001FD9 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6772 00001FDB 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6773                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6774                                  
  6775                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6776                                  
  6777                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6778                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6779                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6780                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6781                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6782                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6783                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6784                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  6785                                  		
  6786                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  6787 00001FDE 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  6788 00001FE0 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  6789 00001FE3 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  6790 00001FE6 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6791                                  
  6792                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6793                                  
  6794 00001FE9 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6795                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6796 00001FEB 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6797                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6798

  6800

  6804                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat

  6835                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved

  7158                                  
  7159                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7160                                  ;
  7161                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7162                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7163                                  ;
  7164                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7165                                  ;
  7166                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7167                                  ;   initialize it.
  7168                                  ;
  7169                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7170                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7171                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7172                                  ;
  7173                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7174                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7175                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7176                                  ;
  7177                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7178                                  ;   save coding.
  7179                                  ;
  7180                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7181                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7182                                  ;
  7183                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7184                                  ;
  7185                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7186                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7187                                  ;
  7188                                  ; called modules:
  7189                                  ;		  getboot
  7190                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7191                                  ;
  7192                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7193                                  ;
  7194                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7195                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7196                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7197                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7198                                  ;
  7199                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7200                                  
  7201                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7202                                  domini:	
  7203 0000212C 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7204                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7205 00002130 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7206                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7207 00002132 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7208 00002134 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7209                                  domini_loop:				
  7210 00002136 52                      		push	dx
  7211 00002137 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7212 0000213B B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7213 0000213D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7214                                  					; DL = drive number
  7215                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7216                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7217                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7218 0000213F FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7219 00002141 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7220 00002143 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7221 00002145 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7222 00002148 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7223 0000214B 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7224 0000214D A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7225 00002150 06                      		push	es
  7226 00002151 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7227 00002155 E87BFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7228                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7229 00002158 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7230 0000215A E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7231                                  domininext:				
  7232 0000215D 07                      		pop	es
  7233 0000215E 5A                      		pop	dx
  7234 0000215F FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7235 00002161 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7236 00002163 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7237                                  dominiret:				
  7238 00002165 C3                      		retn
  7239                                  
  7240                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  7242                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7243                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7245                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7246                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7247                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7248                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7249                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7250                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7251                                  ;
  7252                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7253                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7254                                  
  7255                                  
  7256                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7257 00002166 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7258                                  fmpnext:				
  7259 0000216A 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7260 0000216E 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7261 00002170 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7262 00002173 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7263 00002177 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7264                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7265                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7266                                  fmpnextfound:
  7267 00002179 C3                      		retn
  7268                                  
  7269                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7270                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7271                                  ;fmpret:
  7272                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7273                                  
  7274                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7275                                  
  7276                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7277                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7278 0000217A E89D00                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7279 0000217D 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7280 0000217F 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7281 00002183 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7282                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7283 00002188 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7284                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7285                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7286 0000218C C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7287                                  					; ffHardFile
  7288 00002190 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7289 00002195 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7290 00002198 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7291 0000219B A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7292 0000219E 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7293 000021A1 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7294 000021A4 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7295                                  					; set physical number
  7296 000021A7 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7297 000021AA 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7298                                  					; set logical number
  7299 000021AD 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7300 000021B2 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7301 000021B4 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7302                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7303 000021B9 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7304                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7305                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7306 000021BB 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7307 000021BE 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7308 000021C2 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7309 000021C5 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7310 000021C7 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7311 000021C9 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7312 000021CD 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7313                                  					; set hidden trks
  7314 000021D0 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7315 000021D4 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7316 000021D8 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7317 000021DC BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7318 000021DF B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7319 000021E2 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7320                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7321                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7322                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7323 000021E4 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7324 000021E6 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7325                                  
  7326                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7327                                  		;push	es
  7328 000021E9 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7329                                  					; bx value saved.
  7330                                  		;pop	es  ; 14/08/2023
  7331 000021EC 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7332 000021EE E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7333                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7334 000021F1 E976FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7335                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7337                                  
  7338                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7339                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7340                                  		;retn

  7346

  7348

  7350 000021F5 53                      		push	bx

  7357 000021FB 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7359 00002201 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7361 00002207 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7363 0000220C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7364 00002210 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1

  7367                                  		; 14/08/2023

  7382                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7383                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7384                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7385                                  ;
  7386                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7387                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7388                                  ;			trash ax
  7389                                  
  7390                                  dmax_check:	
  7391 0000221A 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7392 0000221F 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7393 00002221 06                      		push	es
  7394                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7395 00002222 B85004                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7396 00002225 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7397                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7398 00002227 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7399                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7400                                  					; set message flag
  7401                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7402 0000222D 07                      		pop	es
  7403                                  
  7404                                  		;;push	es
  7405                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7406                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7407                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7408                                  					; set message flag
  7409                                  		;;pop	es
  7410                                  		;
  7411                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7412                                  dmax_ok:				
  7413 0000222E C3                      		retn
  7414                                  
  7415                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7416                                  
  7417                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7418                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7419                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7420                                  ;								 
  7421                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7422                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7423                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7424                                  
  7425                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7426 0000222F 56                      		push	si
  7427 00002230 53                      		push	bx
  7428 00002231 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7429                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7430 00002235 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7431 00002238 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7432                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7433 0000223A 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7434 0000223C EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7435                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7436                                  
  7437                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7438                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7439 0000223E 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7440                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7441 00002240 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7442                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7443 00002243 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7444                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7445 00002247 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7446                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7447                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7448 0000224A 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7449 0000224D 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7450 00002251 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7451 00002253 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7452 00002258 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7453 0000225C 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7454 00002261 5B                      		pop	bx
  7455 00002262 5E                      		pop	si
  7456 00002263 C3                      		retn
  7457                                  
  7458                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7459                                  
  7460                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7461                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7462                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7463                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7464                                  
  7465                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7466 00002264 50                      		push	ax
  7467 00002265 51                      		push	cx
  7468 00002266 52                      		push	dx
  7469 00002267 55                      		push	bp
  7470 00002268 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7471                                  loop_clock:				
  7472 0000226A 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7473 0000226C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7474 0000226E B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7475 00002270 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7476                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7477                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7478                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7479 00002272 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7480 00002275 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7481 00002277 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7482 0000227A 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7483 0000227C 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7484 0000227F 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7485 00002281 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7486 00002282 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7487                                  delay:					
  7488 00002285 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7489 00002287 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7490                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7491                                  
  7492                                  clock_present:				
  7493 00002289 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7494 0000228F E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7495                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7496                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7497 00002292 56                      		push	si
  7498 00002293 E893F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7499 00002296 FA                      		cli
  7500                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7501 00002297 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7502 0000229B FB                      		sti
  7503 0000229C 5E                      		pop	si
  7504                                  
  7505                                  no_readdate:				
  7506 0000229D 5D                      		pop	bp
  7507 0000229E 5A                      		pop	dx
  7508 0000229F 59                      		pop	cx
  7509 000022A0 58                      		pop	ax
  7510 000022A1 C3                      		retn
  7511                                  
  7512                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7513                                  
  7514                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7515                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7516                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7517                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7518                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7519                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7520                                  ;
  7521                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7522                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7523                                  ;
  7524                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7525                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7526                                  ;
  7527                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7528                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7529                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7530                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7531                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7532                                  ;
  7533                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7534                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7535                                  
  7536                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7537                                  
  7538                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7539                                  
  7540                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7541                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7542                                  			
  7543 000022A2 50                      		push	ax
  7544 000022A3 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7545 000022A9 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7546 000022AB 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7547                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7548 000022B1 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7549 000022B3 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7550                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7551 000022B9 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7552                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7553                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7554                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7555                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7556                                  cmosck4:				
  7557 000022BB B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7558                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7559 000022BD B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7560                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7561 000022BF E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7562 000022C2 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7563                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7564 000022C4 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7565 000022C7 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7566                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7567 000022C9 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7568 000022CB B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7569                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7570 000022CD E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7571                                  cmosck9:				
  7572 000022D0 58                      		pop	ax
  7573 000022D1 C3                      		retn
  7574                                  
  7575                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7576                                  
  7577                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7578                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7579                                  ;									       :
  7580                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7581                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7582                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7583                                  ;									       :
  7584                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7585                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7586                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7587                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7588                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7589                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7590                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7591                                  
  7592                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7593 000022D2 9C                      		pushf
  7594 000022D3 FA                      		cli
  7595 000022D4 53                      		push	bx
  7596 000022D5 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7597 000022D6 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7598 000022D8 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7599                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7600 000022DA 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7601 000022DB E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7602 000022DD 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7603 000022DF 58                      		pop	ax
  7604 000022E0 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7605 000022E2 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7606 000022E4 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7607                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7608 000022E6 90                      		nop
  7609 000022E7 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7610 000022E9 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7611 000022EB 5B                      		pop	bx
  7612 000022EC 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7613 000022ED E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7614 000022F0 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7615                                  
  7616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7617                                  
  7618                                  cmos_popf:				
  7619 000022F1 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7620                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7621                                  
  7622                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7623                                  
  7624                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7625                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7626                                  ;									       :
  7627                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7628                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7629                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7630                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7631                                  ;									       :
  7632                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7633                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7634                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7635                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7636                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7637                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7638                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7639                                  
  7640                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7641 000022F2 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7642 000022F3 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7643 000022F4 FA                      		cli
  7644 000022F5 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7645 000022F6 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7646 000022F8 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7647                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7648 000022FA 90                      		nop
  7649 000022FB 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7650 000022FD E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7651 000022FF 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7652 00002300 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7653 00002302 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7654 00002304 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7655                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7656 00002306 90                      		nop
  7657 00002307 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7658 00002309 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7659 0000230A 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7660 0000230B E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7661 0000230E C3                      		retn
  7662                                  
  7663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7664                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7665                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7666                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7667                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7668                                  
  7669                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7670                                  ;
  7671                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7672                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7673                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7674                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7675                                  
  7676                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7677                                  
  7678                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7679                                  ;
  7680                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7681                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7682                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7683                                  
  7684                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7685                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7686                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7687                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7688                                  
  7689                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7690                                  getclus:				
  7691 0000230F 51                      		push	cx
  7692 00002310 57                      		push	di
  7693 00002311 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7694 00002316 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7695 00002318 48                      		dec	ax
  7696 00002319 48                      		dec	ax
  7697 0000231A F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7698                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7699                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7700 0000231C 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7701 00002321 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7702                                  unpack:					
  7703 00002326 1E                      		push	ds
  7704 00002327 50                      		push	ax
  7705 00002328 53                      		push	bx
  7706 00002329 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7707 0000232E 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7708 00002330 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7709 00002332 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7710                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7711 00002338 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7712 0000233A D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7713                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7714 0000233C 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7715                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7716 0000233E 52                      		push	dx
  7717 0000233F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7718 00002341 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7719 00002344 5A                      		pop	dx
  7720 00002345 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7721 00002347 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7722                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7723                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7724 00002349 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7725 0000234D 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7726 0000234E 52                      		push	dx
  7727 0000234F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7728 00002351 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7729 00002354 5A                      		pop	dx
  7730                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7731 00002355 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7732 00002358 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7733 0000235C 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7734                                  even_odd:				
  7735 00002360 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7736 00002361 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7737 00002362 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7738 00002364 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7739 00002366 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7740                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7741 00002368 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7742 0000236A D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7743 0000236C D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7744                                  havclus:				
  7745 0000236E 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7746 00002370 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7747 00002374 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7748                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7749                                  
  7750                                  unpack16:				
  7751 00002376 52                      		push	dx
  7752 00002377 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7753 00002379 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7754 0000237B 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7755 0000237E E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7756 00002381 5A                      		pop	dx
  7757 00002382 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7758                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7759                                  unpackx:				
  7760 00002384 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7761 00002385 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7762 00002386 1F                      		pop	ds
  7763 00002387 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7764 00002389 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7765 0000238C 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7766 0000238E 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7767 00002393 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7769                                  
  7770                                  getcl2:					
  7771 00002395 53                      		push	bx
  7772 00002396 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7773 00002397 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7774 00002398 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7775 0000239C 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7776 000023A1 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7777 000023A2 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7778                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7779 000023A7 1E                      		push	ds
  7780 000023A8 0E                      		push	cs
  7781 000023A9 1F                      		pop	ds
  7782 000023AA 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7783                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7784 000023AB BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7785                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7786                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7787 000023AE E8B4F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7788 000023B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7789 000023B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7790 000023B3 5F                      		pop	di
  7791 000023B4 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7792 000023B8 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7793 000023BA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7794 000023BC 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7795 000023BE 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7796 000023BF C3                      		retn
  7797                                  
  7798                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7799                                  
  7800                                  
  7801                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7802                                  ;
  7803                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7804                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7805                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7806                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7807                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7808                                  ;
  7809                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7810                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7811                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7812                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7813                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7814                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7815                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7816                                  
  7817                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7818                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7819 000023C0 50                      		push	ax
  7820 000023C1 51                      		push	cx
  7821 000023C2 57                      		push	di
  7822 000023C3 56                      		push	si
  7823 000023C4 06                      		push	es
  7824 000023C5 1E                      		push	ds
  7825 000023C6 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7826 000023C8 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7827 000023CD F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7828 000023CF 90                      		nop
  7829                                  
  7830                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7831                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7832                                  
  7833 000023D0 06                      		push	es
  7834 000023D1 1E                      		push	ds
  7835 000023D2 57                      		push	di
  7836 000023D3 50                      		push	ax
  7837 000023D4 0E                      		push	cs
  7838 000023D5 1F                      		pop	ds
  7839                                  
  7840 000023D6 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7841 000023DA BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7842                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7843                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7844 000023DD 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7845 000023DE E884F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7846 000023E1 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7847 000023E2 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7848                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7849 000023E6 5F                      		pop	di
  7850 000023E7 1F                      		pop	ds
  7851 000023E8 07                      		pop	es
  7852 000023E9 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7853 000023EE 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7854 000023F0 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7855                                  					; sector number
  7856                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7857 000023F4 52                      		push	dx
  7858 000023F5 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7859                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7860                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7861 000023FC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7862 000023FE B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7863 00002401 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7864 00002405 1E                      		push	ds
  7865 00002406 07                      		pop	es
  7866 00002407 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7867 00002409 1E                      		push	ds
  7868 0000240A 0E                      		push	cs
  7869 0000240B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7870 0000240C 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7871 0000240D BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7872                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7873                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7874 00002410 E852F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7875 00002413 1F                      		pop	ds
  7876 00002414 5A                      		pop	dx
  7877 00002415 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7878                                  
  7879                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7880 0000241A 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7881 0000241B 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7882                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7883                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7884 0000241D 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7885 0000241F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7886 00002420 07                      		pop	es
  7887 00002421 5E                      		pop	si
  7888 00002422 5F                      		pop	di
  7889 00002423 59                      		pop	cx
  7890 00002424 58                      		pop	ax
  7891 00002425 C3                      		retn
  7892                                  
  7893                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7894                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7895                                  
  7896                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7897                                  
  7898                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7899                                  		;db 0
  7900                                  
  7901                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7902                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7903                                  
  7904                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  7905 00002426 00<rep Ah>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7906                                  %endif
  7907                                  
  7908                                  ;align 16
  7909                                  
  7910                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7911                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7912                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7913

  7915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7916                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7917                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7918                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7920                                  
  7921                                  ;============================================================================
  7922                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7923                                  ;============================================================================
  7924                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7925                                  
  7926                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7927                                  
  7928                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7929                                   
  7930                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7931                                  
  7932                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7933                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
