  7934                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7935                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7936                                  
  7937                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7938 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7939 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7940                                  
  7941                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7942                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7943                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7944                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7947                                  
  7948                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7949                                  
  7950                                  ;************************************************************************
  7951                                  ;*									*
  7952                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7953                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7954                                  ;*									*
  7955                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7956                                  ;*									*
  7957                                  ;************************************************************************
  7958                                  
  7959                                  _seg_reinit:
  7960 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7961                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7962                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7963 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7964 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7965                                  
  7966                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7967 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7968 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7969 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7970 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7971 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7972                                  
  7973                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7974                                  
  7975                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7976                                  
  7977                                  ;************************************************************************
  7978                                  ;*									*
  7979                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7980                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7981                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7982                                  ;*									*
  7983                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7984                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7985                                  ;*									*
  7986                                  ;************************************************************************
  7987                                  
  7988                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7989 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7990 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7991 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7992 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7993 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7994 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7995 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7996 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7997 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7998 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7999 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8000                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8001                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8002 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8003 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8004 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8005 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8006 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8007 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8008 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8009 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8010 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8011 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8012                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8013 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8014                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8015                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8016 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8017                                  
  8018                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8019                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8020                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8021                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8022                                  ;
  8023                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8024                                  ;
  8025                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8026                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8027                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8028                                  ;
  8029                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8030                                  
  8031                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8032 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8033 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8034 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8035 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8036                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8037                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8038 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8039 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8040                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8041                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8042 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8043 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8044 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8045 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8046 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8047 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8048 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8049 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8050 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8051 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8052                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8053 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8054                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8055 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8056 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8057                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8058                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8059                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8060                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8061 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8062                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8063 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8064 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8065                                  					; mark operation complete
  8066 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8067 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8068 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8069 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8070 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8071 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8072 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8073 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8074 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8075 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8076                                  	
  8077                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8078                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8079                                  bc_retf:
  8080 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8081                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8082                                  
  8083                                  command_error:				
  8084 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8085 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8086                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8087                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8090                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8091                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8092                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8093                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8094                                  ; high.
  8095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8096                                  
  8097                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8098                                  
  8099                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8100                                  
  8101 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8102                                  
  8103 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8104                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8105                                  		
  8106                                  
  8107                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8108                                  
  8109                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8110                                  
  8111                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8112 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8113                                  					; unknown command error
  8114                                  
  8115                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8116                                  
  8117                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8118                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8119                                  
  8120                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8121                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8122                                  
  8123                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8124                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8125                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8126 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8127 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8128                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8129 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8130 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8131 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8132                                  
  8133                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8134                                  
  8135                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8136                                  
  8137                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8138                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8140                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8141                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8142                                  
  8143                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8144                                  
  8145                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8146                                  
  8147                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8148                                  
  8149                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8150                                  
  8151                                  ;************************************************************************
  8152                                  ;*									*
  8153                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8154                                  ;*									*
  8155                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8156                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8157                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8158                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8159                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8160                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8161                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8162                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8163                                  ;*									*
  8164                                  ;************************************************************************
  8165                                  
  8166                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8167                                  		;db 0
  8168                                  
  8169                                  		; 13/12/202
  8170 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8171                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8172 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8173                                  					; 00 init
  8174 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8175 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8176 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8177                                  					; 03
  8178 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8179                                  					; 04
  8180 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8181                                  					; 05
  8182 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8183 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8184                                  					; 07
  8185 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8186                                  					; 08
  8187 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8188 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8189                                  con_table_end:
  8190 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8191                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8192 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8193 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8194 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8195 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8196 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8197                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8198 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8199                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8200 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8201 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8202 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8203 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8204 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8205 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8206 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8207 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8208 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8209 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8210 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8211 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8212 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8213 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8214 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8215 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8216 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8217 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8218 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8219 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8220                                  prn_table_end:
  8221 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8222                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8223 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8224 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8225 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8226 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8227 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8228 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8229 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8230 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8231 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8232 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8233 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8234                                  aux_table_end:
  8235 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8236                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8237 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8238 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8239 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8240 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8241 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8242 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8243 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8244 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8245 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8246 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8247                                  tim_table_end:
  8248                                  
  8249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8250                                  
  8251                                  ;************************************************************************
  8252                                  ;*									*
  8253                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8254                                  ;*									*
  8255                                  ;************************************************************************
  8256                                  
  8257                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8258                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8259 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8260                                  con_loop:				
  8261 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8262 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8263 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8264                                  con_exit:				
  8265 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8266 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8267                                  
  8268                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8269                                  
  8270                                  ;************************************************************************
  8271                                  ;*									*
  8272                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8273                                  ;*									*
  8274                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8275                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8276                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8277                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8278                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8279                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8280                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8281                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8282                                  ;*									*
  8283                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8284                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8285                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8286                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8287                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8288                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8289                                  ;*									*
  8290                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8291                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8292                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8293                                  ;*									*
  8294                                  ;************************************************************************
  8295                                  
  8296                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8297                                  chrin:		
  8298 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8299 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8300 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8301 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8302 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8303 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8304 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8305 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8306 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8307 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8308 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8309 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8311                                  
  8312                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8313                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8314                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8315                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8316                                  ;      else
  8317                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8318                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8319                                  ;      endif
  8320                                  ;    endif
  8321                                  ;  endif
  8322                                  
  8323                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8324 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8325 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8326 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8327 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8328 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8329 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8330 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8331 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8332                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8333                                  
  8334                                  not_ext:				
  8335 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8336 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8337                                  alt_save:				
  8338 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8339                                  keyret:					
  8340 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8341                                  
  8342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8343                                  
  8344                                  ;************************************************************************
  8345                                  ;*									*
  8346                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8347                                  ;*									*
  8348                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8349                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8350                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8351                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8352                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8353                                  ;*									*
  8354                                  ;************************************************************************
  8355                                  
  8356                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8357                                  con_rdnd:				
  8358 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8359 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8360 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8361 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8362 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8363 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8364 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8365 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8366 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8367                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8368 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8369                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8370 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8371 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8372 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8373 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8374                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8375                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8376                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8377                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8378 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8379 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8380 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8381                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8382                                  
  8383                                  gotchr:					
  8384 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8385 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8386 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8387 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8388 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8389                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8390                                  
  8391                                  notbrk:					
  8392 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8393 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8394 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8395 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8396                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8397                                  
  8398                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8399 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8400 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8401 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8402 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8403 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8404 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8405 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8406                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8407                                  rdexit:					
  8408 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8409 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8410                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8411                                  bc_exvec:				
  8412 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8413                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8414 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8416                                  
  8417                                  ;************************************************************************
  8418                                  ;*									*
  8419                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8420                                  ;*									*
  8421                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8422                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8423                                  ;*									*
  8424                                  ;************************************************************************
  8425                                  
  8426                                  con_writ:
  8427                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8428 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8429                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8430                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8431                                  con_lp:					
  8432 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8433 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8434 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8435                                  					; AL = character to display
  8436 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8437                                  cc_ret:					
  8438 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8439 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8440                                  
  8441                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8442                                  
  8443                                  ;************************************************************************
  8444                                  ;*									*
  8445                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8446                                  ;*									*
  8447                                  ;************************************************************************
  8448                                  
  8449                                  con_flush:
  8450 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8451                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8452 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8453 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8454                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8455                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8456                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8457 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8458 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8459 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8460                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8461 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8462                                  
  8463                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8464                                  
  8465                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8466                                  
  8467                                  ;************************************************************************
  8468                                  ;*									*
  8469                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8470                                  ;*									*
  8471                                  ;************************************************************************
  8472                                  
  8473                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8474                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8475                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8476                                  
  8477                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8478                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8479                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8480                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8481                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8482                                  ;
  8483                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8484                                  
  8485                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8486                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8487                                  
  8488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8489                                  
  8490                                  ;************************************************************************
  8491                                  ;*									*
  8492                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8493                                  ;*									*
  8494                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8495                                  ;*									*
  8496                                  ;************************************************************************
  8497                                  
  8498                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8499 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8500                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8501                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8502                                  prn_done:
  8503 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8504 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8505                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8506                                  
  8507                                  ;************************************************************************
  8508                                  ;*									*
  8509                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8510                                  ;*									*
  8511                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8512                                  ;*									*
  8513                                  ;************************************************************************
  8514                                  
  8515                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8516                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8517 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8518                                  prn_loop:				
  8519 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8520                                  prn_out:				
  8521 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8522 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8523 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8524 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8525 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8526 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8527 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8528 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8529 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8530 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8531 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8532                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8533                                  
  8534                                  _prnwf:					
  8535 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8536 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8537                                  TestPrnError:				
  8538 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8539 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8540                                  pmessg:					
  8541 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8543                                  
  8544                                  prn_con:				
  8545 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8546 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8547                                  ;prn_done:				
  8548                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8549                                  prn_done2:
  8550                                  		;clc
  8551                                  		; cf=0
  8552 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8554                                  
  8555                                  ;************************************************************************
  8556                                  ;*									*
  8557                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8558                                  ;*									*
  8559                                  ;************************************************************************
  8560                                  
  8561                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8562 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8563 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8564 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8565                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8566                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8567 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8568 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8569                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8570                                  
  8571                                  ;************************************************************************
  8572                                  ;*									*
  8573                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8574                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8575                                  ;*									*
  8576                                  ;************************************************************************
  8577                                  
  8578                                  prnstat:				
  8579 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8580                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8581                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8582                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8583                                  
  8584                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8585                                  
  8586                                  ;************************************************************************
  8587                                  ;*									*
  8588                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8589                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8590                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8591                                  ;*									*
  8592                                  ;************************************************************************
  8593                                  
  8594                                  prnop:	
  8595 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8596 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8597                                  
  8598                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8599                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8600                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8601                                  
  8602 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8603 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8604 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8605 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8606 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8607 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8608 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8609                                  
  8610                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8611                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8612                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8613                                  
  8614                                  NextTest:				
  8615 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8616                                  					; i/o error?
  8617 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8618                                  
  8619                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8620                                  
  8621 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8622                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8623 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8624 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8625 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8626                                  ret1:					
  8627 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8629                                  
  8630                                  checknotready:				
  8631 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8632 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8633 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8634                                  
  8635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8636                                  
  8637                                  ;************************************************************************
  8638                                  ;*									*
  8639                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8640                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8641                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8642                                  ;*									*
  8643                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8644                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8645                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8646                                  ;*									*
  8647                                  ;************************************************************************
  8648                                  
  8649                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8650                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8651 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8652                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8653 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8654 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8655 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8656 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8657 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8658                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8659 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8660 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8661                                  prn_getstat:				
  8662 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8663 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8664 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8665 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8666 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8667 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8668 000002A6 26                      		es
  8669 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8670                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8671                                  					; lodsb
  8672 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8673 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8674 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8675 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8676                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8677                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8678                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8679 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8680                                  
  8681                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8682                                  
  8683                                  prn_bperr:				
  8684 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8685                                  prn_berr:				
  8686 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8688                                  
  8689                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8690                                  
  8691                                  ;************************************************************************
  8692                                  ;*									*
  8693                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8694                                  ;*									*
  8695                                  ;************************************************************************
  8696                                  
  8697                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8698                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8699                                  
  8700                                  ;********************************;*
  8701                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8702                                  ;********************************;*
  8703                                  
  8704                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8705                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8706                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8707                                  
  8708                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8709                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8710                                  ;;endstruc
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8713                                  
  8714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8715                                  
  8716                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8717                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8718 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8719 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8720                                  					; ioc_pc
  8721 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8722                                  
  8723                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8724 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8726                                  
  8727                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8728 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8729 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8730 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8731                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8732 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8733 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8734                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8735 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8736 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8737 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8738 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8739 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8740 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8741                                  prngetcount:				
  8742                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8743 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8744 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8745                                  					; return current retry count
  8746                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8747                                  		; cf=0
  8748                                  		;clc
  8749 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8750                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8751                                  
  8752                                  ;************************************************************************
  8753                                  ;*									*
  8754                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8755                                  ;*									*
  8756                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8757                                  ;************************************************************************
  8758                                  
  8759                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8760 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8761 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8762                                  					; ioc_pc
  8763 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8764 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8765 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8766 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8767 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8768 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8769                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8770                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8771                                  		; cf=0		
  8772                                  		;clc
  8773 00000302 C3                      		retn
  8774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8775                                  
  8776                                  prn_query_err:
  8777                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8778                                  		;stc
  8779 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8780                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8781                                  
  8782                                  ;************************************************************************
  8783                                  ;*									*
  8784                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8785                                  ;*									*
  8786                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8787                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8788                                  ;*									*
  8789                                  ;************************************************************************
  8790                                  
  8791                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8792                                  
  8793                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8794                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8795                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8796                                  
  8797                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8798                                  
  8799                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8800                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8801                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8802                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8803                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8804                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8805                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8806                                  
  8807                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8808                                  
  8809                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8810                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8811                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8812                                  
  8813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8814                                  
  8815                                  ;************************************************************************
  8816                                  ;*									*
  8817                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8818                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8819                                  ;*									*
  8820                                  ;************************************************************************
  8821                                  
  8822                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8823                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8824 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8825 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8826 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8827 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8828 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8829 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8830                                  aux1:					
  8831 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8832                                  					; won't return if error
  8833                                  aux2:					
  8834 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8835 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8836                                  exvec2:					
  8837 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8838                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8839 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8841                                  
  8842                                  ;************************************************************************
  8843                                  ;*									*
  8844                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8845                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8846                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8847                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8848                                  ;*									*
  8849                                  ;************************************************************************
  8850                                  
  8851                                  auxin:					
  8852 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8853 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8854 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8855                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8856                                  		;retn
  8857                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8858 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8860                                  
  8861                                  arbad:					
  8862 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8863 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8864 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8865 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8866                                  
  8867                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8868                                  
  8869                                  ;************************************************************************
  8870                                  ;*									*
  8871                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8872                                  ;*									*
  8873                                  ;************************************************************************
  8874                                  
  8875                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8876 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8877 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8878 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8879 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8880 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8881 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8882 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8883 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8884 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8885 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8886 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8887                                  auxdrx:					
  8888 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8890                                  
  8891                                  auxbus:					
  8892 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8893                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8894                                  
  8895                                  ;************************************************************************
  8896                                  ;*									*
  8897                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8898                                  ;*									*
  8899                                  ;************************************************************************
  8900                                  
  8901                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  8902 0000034D E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  8903 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8904 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8905 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8906 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8907                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8908                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8909                                  		;clc
  8910 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8911                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8912                                  
  8913                                  ;************************************************************************
  8914                                  ;*									*
  8915                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8916                                  ;*									*
  8917                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8918                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8919                                  ;*									*
  8920                                  ;************************************************************************
  8921                                  
  8922                                  auxstat:				
  8923 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8924                                  
  8925                                  		; fall into auxop
  8926                                  
  8927                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8928                                  
  8929                                  ;************************************************************************
  8930                                  ;*									*
  8931                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8932                                  ;*									*
  8933                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8934                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8935                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8936                                  ;*									*
  8937                                  ;************************************************************************
  8938                                  
  8939                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8940 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8941                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8942                                  					; get port number
  8943 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8944                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8945                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8946 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8947                                  
  8948                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8949                                  
  8950                                  ;************************************************************************
  8951                                  ;*									*
  8952                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8953                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8954                                  ;*									*
  8955                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8956                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8957                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8958                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8959                                  ;*									*
  8960                                  ;************************************************************************
  8961                                  
  8962                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8963 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8964 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8965                                  					; zero out buffer
  8966                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8967                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8968                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8969 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8970                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8971                                  
  8972                                  ;************************************************************************
  8973                                  ;*									*
  8974                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8975                                  ;*									*
  8976                                  ;************************************************************************
  8977                                  
  8978                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8979                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8980 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8981                                  aux_loop:				
  8982 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8983                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8984 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8985 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8986 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8987 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8988 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8989 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8990 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8991                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8992                                  
  8993                                  awok:					
  8994 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8995                                  					; still	more character to print
  8996                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8997                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8998                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8999 00000381 C3                      		retn
  9000                                  
  9001                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9002                                  
  9003                                  ;************************************************************************
  9004                                  ;*									*
  9005                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9006                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9007                                  ;*									*
  9008                                  ;************************************************************************
  9009                                  
  9010                                  getbx:	
  9011 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9012                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9013                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9014 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9015                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9016                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9017 0000038A C3                      		retn
  9018                                  
  9019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9020                                  
  9021                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9022                                  
  9023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9024                                  ;								:
  9025                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9026                                  ;								:
  9027                                  ;								:
  9028                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9029                                  ;								:
  9030                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9031                                  ;								:
  9032                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9033                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9034                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9035                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9036                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9037                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9038                                  ;								:
  9039                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9040                                  ;								:
  9041                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9042                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9043                                  ;								:
  9044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9045                                  
  9046                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9047                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9048                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9049                                  
  9050                                  ;19/07/2019
  9051                                  ;09/03/2019
  9052                                  
  9053                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9054
