 14339                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14340                                  
 14341                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14342                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14343                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14344                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14345                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14346                                  
 14347                                  install_bds:		
 14348 000016CF 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14349 000016D0 BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14350                                  
 14351                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14352                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14353                                  loop_next_bds:				
 14354 000016D3 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14355                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14356 000016D5 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14357 000016D9 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14358                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14359 000016DC 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14360 000016DE B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14361 000016E0 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14362                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14363 000016E4 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14364 000016E7 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14365                                  					; we don't own it
 14366 000016EC 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14367                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14368 000016EF 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14369 000016F2 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14370                                  next_bds:				
 14371                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14372 000016F6 B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14373 000016F9 3904                    		cmp	[si], ax	; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14374                                  		;cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14375                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14376 000016FB 75D6                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14377 000016FD 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14378                                  					; install bds
 14379 00001700 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14380 00001702 268905                  		mov	[es:di], ax	; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14381                                  		;mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14382                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14383 00001705 1F                      		pop	ds
 14384                                  
 14385                                  ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 6.0 Code)
 14386                                  ;
 14387                                  ; **** If the new drive has a higher EOT value, we must alter the
 14388                                  ;      'eot' variable appropriately.
 14389                                  ;
 14390                                  ;		; 01/06/2019
 14391                                  ;		;mov	al,[es:di+52]
 14392                                  ;		mov	al,[es:di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
 14393                                  ;
 14394                                  ;		cmp	al,[eot]
 14395                                  ;		jbe	short _eot_ok
 14396                                  ;		mov	[eot],al
 14397                                  
 14398 00001706 C3                      		retn

 14489                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14490                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14491                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14492                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14493                                  
 14494                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14495 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14496 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14496 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14496 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14497                                  
 14498                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14499 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14499 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14499 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14499 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14500 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14501                                  
 14502                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14503                                  
 14504                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14505                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14506                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14507                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14508                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14509                                  
 14510                                  chkopcnt:		
 14511 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14512 0000178D C3                      		retn
 14513                                  
 14514                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14515                                  
 14516                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14517                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14518                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14519                                  ;
 14520                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14521                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14522                                  
 14523                                  mediacheck:	
 14524 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14525 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14526 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14527 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14528 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14529 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14530 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 14531 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 14532 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14533                                  					; set logical drive number
 14534 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14535 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14536                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14537                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14538 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 14539 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 14540 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14541 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14542                                  
 14543                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14544                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14545                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14546                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14547                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14548                                  ; status.
 14549                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14550 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14551 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14552                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14553                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14554                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14555                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14556 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14557                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14558                                  
 14559                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14560                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14561                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14562                                  
 14563 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 14564 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 14565 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14566 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14567 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14568 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 14569 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 14570 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14571 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14572                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14573 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14574                                  mediaret:				
 14575 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 14576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14577                                  
 14578                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14579                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14580                                  ; or write.
 14581                                  
 14582                                  mediadovolid:				
 14583 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14584 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14585 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14586 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14587 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14589                                  
 14590                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14591                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14592                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14593                                  ; dos.
 14594                                  ;
 14595                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14596                                  
 14597                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14598                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14599                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14600                                  
 14601                                  checklatchio:	
 14602                                  
 14603                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14604                                  			
 14605 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14606 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14607                                  
 14608                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14609                                  
 14610 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14611 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14612                                  
 14613                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14614                                  ; expensive verification.
 14615                                  
 14616 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14617 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14618 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14619 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14620 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14621 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14622 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14623                                  checklatchret:				
 14624 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14625                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14626 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 14627 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14628                                  checkret:				
 14629 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 14630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14631                                  
 14632                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14633                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14634                                  ;
 14635                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14636                                  
 14637                                  checkfatvid:				
 14638 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14639 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14640 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14641                                  
 14642                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14643                                  
 14644                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14645                                  
 14646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14647                                  
 14648                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14649                                  ;
 14650                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14651                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14652                                  ;
 14653                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14654                                  ;
 14655                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14656                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14657                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14658                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14659                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14660                                  ;
 14661                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14662                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14663                                  ; routine.)
 14664                                  ;
 14665                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14666                                  
 14667                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14668                                  check_vid:
 14669                                  
 14670                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14671                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14672                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14673                                  
 14674 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14675                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14676                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14677 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14678 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14679 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14680 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14681 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14682                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14683 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14684                                  					; if not fat system
 14685 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14686 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14687 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14688 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14689                                  					; definitely changed
 14690 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14691                                  
 14692 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14693                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14694 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14695                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14696                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14697                                  		;clc
 14698                                  checkfatret:				
 14699 00001823 C3                      		retn
 14700                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14701                                  
 14702                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14703                                  changed_drv:
 14704 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14705 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14706                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14707 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14709                                  
 14710                                  ; extended id check
 14711                                  
 14712                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14713                                  
 14714                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14715                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14716                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14717                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14718                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14719                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14720                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14721                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14722                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14723                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14724                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14725                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14726                                  ;
 14727                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14728                                  
 14729                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14730                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14731 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 14732                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14733                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14734 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14735                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14736 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14737 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14738 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14739 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14740 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14741 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14742                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14743                                  					; don't know
 14744 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 14745 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14746                                  					; reset the flag
 14747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14748                                  
 14749                                  ext_changed:
 14750 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 14751                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14752 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14753                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14754                                  					; disk changed!
 14755                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14756                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14757                                  		;clc
 14758 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14759                                  
 14760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14761                                  
 14762                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14763                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14764                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14765                                  ;
 14766                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14767                                  
 14768                                  checkio:				
 14769 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14770 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14771 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14772 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14773 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14774 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14775 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14776 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14777 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14778 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14779 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14780 00001860 C3                      		retn
 14781                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14782                                  
 14783                                  checkioerr:				
 14784 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14785                                  
 14786                                  checkioret:				
 14787 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14788 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14789                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14790                                  
 14791                                  no_error_map:				
 14792 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14793                                  
 14794                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14795                                  
 14796                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14797                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14798                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14799                                  
 14800                                  returnvid:		
 14801 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14802                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14803 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14804 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14805 00001873 F9                      		stc
 14806 00001874 C3                      		retn
 14807                                  
 14808                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14809                                  
 14810                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14811                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14812                                  ;
 14813                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14814                                  ; **trashes si**
 14815                                  
 14816                                  media_set_vid:				
 14817 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14818                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14819                                  
 14820                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14821                                  
 14822                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14823                                  
 14824                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14825                                  
 14826                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14827                                  vid_into_packet:
 14828 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14829 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14830 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14831 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14832 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14833 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14834 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 14835                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14836 00001889 C3                      		retn
 14837                                  
 14838                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14839                                  
 14840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14841                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14842                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14843                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14844                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14845                                  ;
 14846                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14847                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14848                                  ;
 14849                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14850                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14851                                  ;		carry set
 14852                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14853                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14854                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14855                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14856                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14857                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14858                                  ;
 14859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14860                                  
 14861                                  hidensity:
 14862                                  
 14863                                  ; check for correct drive
 14864                                  		
 14865                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14866 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14867                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14868                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14869 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14870                                  
 14871                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14872                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14873                                  
 14874 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14875 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14876                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14877                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14878 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14879 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14880                                  
 14881                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14882                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14883                                  
 14884                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14885 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14886 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14887                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14888                                  					; ffOther
 14889 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14890 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14891                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14892                                  					; ff288
 14893 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14894 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14895 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14896                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14897                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14898 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14899                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14900                                  					; 2 sides
 14901                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14902 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14903 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14904                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14905                                  					; & head max
 14906                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14907 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14908                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14909                                  
 14910                                  Is720K:
 14911                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14912 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14913                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14914 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14916                                  
 14917                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14918                                  ;dofloppy:
 14919                                  		;retn
 14920                                  
 14921                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14922                                  
 14923                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14924                                  
 14925                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14926                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14927                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14928                                  ;
 14929                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14930                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14931                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14932                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14933                                  ;
 14934                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14935                                  ;
 14936                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14937                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14938                                  
 14939                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14940 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 14941 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 14942                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14943                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14944 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14945                                  
 14946                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14947                                  
 14948                                  scan_bds:				
 14949 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14950 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14951                                  
 14952                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14953                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14954                                  
 14955 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14956                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14957                                  get_next_bds:				
 14958 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14959                                  					; go to	next bds
 14960 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14961 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14962 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 14963 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 14964 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 14965                                  
 14966                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14967                                  
 14968                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14969                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14970                                  ;
 14971                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14972                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14973                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14974                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14975                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14976                                  
 14977                                  checkromchange:	
 14978                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14979                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14980 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14981                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14982                                  					; fchanged
 14983 000018DC C3                      		retn
 14984                                  
 14985                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14986                                  
 14987                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14988                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14989                                  ;
 14990                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14991                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14992                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14993                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14994                                  
 14995                                  resetchanged:	
 14996                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14997                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14998 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14999                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15000                                  					; ~fchanged
 15001 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 15002                                  
 15003                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15004                                  
 15005                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15006                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15007                                  ;
 15008                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15009                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15010                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15011                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15012                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15013                                  
 15014                                  haschange:
 15015                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15016                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15017 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15018                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15019                                  					; fchangeline
 15020 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 15021                                  
 15022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15023                                  
 15024                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15025                                  
 15026                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15027                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15028                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15029                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15030                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15031                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15032                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15033                                  
 15034                                  ; set_volume_id
 15035                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15036                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15037                                  ;
 15038                                  ;   on entry:
 15039                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15040                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15041                                  ;
 15042                                  ;   on exit:
 15043                                  ;	carry clear:
 15044                                  ;	   successful call
 15045                                  ;	carry set
 15046                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15047                                  
 15048                                  set_volume_id:				
 15049 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15050 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 15051 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15052 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15053 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15054 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15055 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15056 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15057                                  setvret:				
 15058                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15059                                  		; cf = 0
 15060                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15061 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15062 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15063 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15064                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15065                                  
 15066                                  seterr:					
 15067 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15068 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15069 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15070                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15071 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15072                                  
 15073                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15074                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15075                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15076                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15077                                  
 15078                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15079                                  
 15080                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15081                                  
 15082                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15083                                  ;
 15084                                  ;   on entry:
 15085                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15086                                  ;
 15087                                  ;   on exit:
 15088                                  ;	carry clear
 15089                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15090                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15091                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15092                                  ;
 15093                                  ;	carry set:
 15094                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15095                                  
 15096                                  read_volume_id:
 15097 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15098 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15099 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15100 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15101 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15102 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15103 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15104 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15105 0000190B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15106 0000190E BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15107 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15108 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15109 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15110 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15111 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15112                                  					; # of fats
 15113 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15114                                  					; sectors / fat
 15115 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15116 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15117                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15118                                  					;
 15119                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15120                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15121 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15122                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15123                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15124 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15125                                  					; # root dir entries
 15126 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15127 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15128                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15129                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15130 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15131                                  next_sec:				
 15132 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15133 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15134                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15135                                  					; get sector #
 15136 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15137                                  					; sectors / track
 15138 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15139 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15140                                  
 15141                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15142                                  
 15143 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15144                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15145 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15146 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15147 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15148                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15149 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15150 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15151 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15152                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15153 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15154 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15155 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15156                                  fvid_loop:
 15157                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15158 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15159                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15160 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15161 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15162 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15163 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15164 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15165                                  ent_loop:				
 15166 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15167 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15168 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15169 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15170                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15171                                  					; next sector
 15172 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15173                                  notfound:
 15174                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15175                                  		;xor	si, si
 15176 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15177                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15178                                  
 15179                                  found_vid:
 15180                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15181                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15182 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15183 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15184 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15185 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15186 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15187 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15188 0000197B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15189 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15190                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15191 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15192                                  		;xor	al, al
 15193                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15194 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15195 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15196                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15197                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15198                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15199 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15200 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15201                                  fvid_ret:
 15202                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15203 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15204                                  				
 15205 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15206                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15207                                  		; cf = 0
 15208                                  		;clc
 15209                                  rvidret:
 15210 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15211 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15212 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15213 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15214                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15215                                  
 15216                                  no_vid:
 15217 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15218                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15219                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15220 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15221                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15222                                  
 15223                                  readviderr:				
 15224 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15225 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15226 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15227                                  
 15228                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15229                                  
 15230                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15231                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15232                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15233 00001995 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15234                                  		;
 15235                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15236                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15237                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15238                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15239 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15240 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15241                                  		;
 15242 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15243 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15244                                  
 15245                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15246                                  
 15247                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15248                                  ;
 15249                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15250                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15251                                  
 15252                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15253 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15254 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15255 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15256                                  		
 15257                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15258                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15259                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15260                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15261                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15262                                  		;cld
 15263                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15264 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15265                                  
 15266 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15267 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15268 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15269 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15270 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15271                                  
 15272                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15273                                  
 15274                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15275                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15276                                  ;
 15277                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15278                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15279                                  
 15280                                  check_volume_id:
 15281 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15282 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15283                                  		
 15284                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15285                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15286                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15287                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15288                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15289                                  		;cld
 15290                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15291 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15292                                  
 15293 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15294 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15295 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15296 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15297                                  
 15298                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15299                                  
 15300                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15301                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15302                                  ;
 15303                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15304                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15305                                  ;
 15306                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15307                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15308                                  ;
 15309                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15310                                  
 15311                                  fat_check:		
 15312 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15313 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15314 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15315 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15316                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15317 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15318 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15319                                  okret1:					
 15320 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15321 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15322                                  
 15323                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15324                                  
 15325                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15326                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15327                                  
 15328                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15329                                  
 15330                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15331                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15332                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15333                                  
 15334                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15335                                  
 15336                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15337                                  		;db 0
 15338                                  
 15339                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15340                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15341                                  
 15342                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15343 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15344                                  %endif
 15345                                  
 15346                                  ;align 16
 15347                                  
 15348                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15349                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15350                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15351                                  BCODEEND:
 15352                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15353                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15354                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15355                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15356                                  
 15357                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15358

 15360                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15361                                  ; ============================================================================
 15362                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15368                                  ;=============================================================================
 15369                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT
