 30193                                  	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30194                                  	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 30195                                  
 30196                                  	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30197                                  	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 30198                                  
 30199                                  	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 30200                                  	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 30201                                  	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 30202                                  	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 30203                                  	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 30204                                  	retn
 30205                                  m32E:	
 30206                                  	pop	ax
 30207                                  	retn
 30208                                  
 30209                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30210                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 30211                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30212                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 30213                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 30214                                  ; ERROR:   None
 30215                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 30216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30217                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 30218                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 30219                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30220                                  
 30221                                  toPara:
 30222                                  	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 30223                                  
 30224                                  	mov	cl,4		;
 30225                                  	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 30226                                  	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 30227                                  	mov	cl,12
 30228                                  	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 30229                                  	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 30230                                  
 30231                                  	pop	cx
 30232                                  	retn
 30233                                  
 30234                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30235                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30236                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30237                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30238                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30239                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30240                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30241                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30242                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 30243                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 30244                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 30245                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 30246                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30247                                  
 30248                                  UmbHead:
 30249                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 30250                                  
 30251                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30252                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 30253                                  	;push	es
 30254                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 30255                                  
 30256                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30257                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30258                                  
 30259                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30260                                  	int	21h
 30261                                  
 30262                                  	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 30263                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30264                                  	je	short uhE		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30265                                  
 30266                                  	clc				; Else, it isn't (CLC done by prev cmp)
 30267                                  	;jmp	short uhX
 30268                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30269                                  	retn
 30270                                  uhE:	
 30271                                  	stc
 30272                                  uhX:	
 30273                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30274                                  	;pop	es
 30275                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30276                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30277                                  	retn
 30278                                  
 30279                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30280                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 30281                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30282                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 30283                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 30284                                  ; USES:   Flags
 30285                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30286                                  
 30287                                  isSysMCB:
 30288                                  	;push	ax
 30289                                  
 30290                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30291                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30292                                  	;je	short ism10
 30293                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 30294                                  	;;je	short ism10
 30295                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 30296                                  	;jne	short ismX
 30297                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 30298                                  	jne	short ismX 
 30299                                  ism10:	
 30300                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 30301                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 30302                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 30303                                  ismX:	
 30304                                  	;pop	ax
 30305                                  	retn
 30306                                  
 30307                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30308                                  
 30309                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30310                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 30311                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30312                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 30313                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 30314                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 30315                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30316                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30317                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 30318                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 30319                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 30320                                  ;      ...
 30321                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 30322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30323                                  
 30324                                  AddrToUmb:
 30325                                  	push	cx
 30326                                  	push	dx
 30327                                  	push	es
 30328                                  
 30329                                  	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 30330                                  
 30331                                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 30332                                  	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 30333                                  
 30334                                  	; 14/08/2023
 30335                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 30336                                  	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 30337                                  
 30338                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30339                                  atu10:
 30340                                  	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 14/08/2023
 30341                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 30342                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 30343                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 30344                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 30345                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 30346                                  
 30347                                  ;atu10:	
 30348                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 14/08/2023
 30349                                          cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 30350                                  	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 30351                                  
 30352                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 30353                                  	jnz	short atu20
 30354                                  
 30355                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 30356                                  atu20:	
 30357                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30358                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 30359                                  	; 14/08/2023
 30360                                  	; ax = es
 30361                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 30362                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30363                                  	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 30364                                  	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30365                                  
 30366                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 30367                                  
 30368                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 30369                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 30370                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30371                                  	inc	ax
 30372                                  	; 14/08/2023
 30373                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 30374                                  	jmp	short atu10
 30375                                  
 30376                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30377                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 30378                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 30379                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30380                                  
 30381                                  atu30:	
 30382                                  	; 14/08/2023
 30383                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 30384                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 30385                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 30386                                  	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 30387                                  	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 30388                                  atuE:	
 30389                                  	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 30390                                  	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 30391                                  atuX:	
 30392                                  	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 30393                                  	
 30394                                  	pop	es	
 30395                                  	pop	dx
 30396                                  	pop	cx
 30397                                  	retn
 30398                                  
 30399                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30400                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 30401                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 30402                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 30403                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 30404                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30405                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 30406                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 30407                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30408                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30409                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30410                                  
 30411                                  convUMB:
 30412                                  	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 30413                                  	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 30414                                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 30415                                  ;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30416                                  	;jne	short cu10
 30417                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 30418                                  	; 14/08/2023
 30419                                  	inc	ax
 30420                                  	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 30421                                  	dec	ax
 30422                                  cu10:	
 30423                                  	retn
 30424                                  
 30425                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30426                                  ;*** setUMBs - links umbs and sets allocation strategy for a load
 30427                                  ;            -- if LoadHigh, the allocation strategy MAY be LOW_FIRST instead
 30428                                  ; of the usual HIGH_FIRST.  See the code.
 30429                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30430                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30431                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30432                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30433                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_umb, fm_strat
 30434                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30435                                  
 30436                                  setUMBs:
 30437                                  	push	ax
 30438                                  	push	bx
 30439                                  	call	fm_link
 30440                                  	pop	bx
 30441                                  	pop	ax
 30442                                  	retn
 30443                                  
 30444                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30445                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 30446                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30447                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30448                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 30449                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 30450                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30451                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 30452                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30453                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 30454                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0.  That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 30455                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 30456                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 30457                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30458                                  
 30459                                  loadLow:
 30460                                  	;push	ds
 30461                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 30462                                  	;pop	ds	
 30463                                  
 30464                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 30465                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30466                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 30467                                  	jne	short ll10
 30468                                  
 30469                                  	stc
 30470                                  ll15:
 30471                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 30472                                  	;stc
 30473                                  	;jmp	short llX
 30474                                  	retn
 30475                                  ll10:	
 30476                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 30477                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 30478                                  
 30479                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30480                                  	retn
 30481                                  
 30482                                  	;mov	al,1
 30483                                  	;clc
 30484                                  ;llX:
 30485                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 30486                                  	;retn
 30487                                  
 30488                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30489                                  ;*** HideUMBs - links UMBs and hides upper-memory as appropriate
 30490                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30491                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30492                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30493                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30494                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 30495                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30496                                  
 30497                                  HideUMBs:
 30498                                  	push	ax
 30499                                  	push	cx
 30500                                  	push	ds
 30501                                  	push	es
 30502                                  
 30503                                  	call	UmbTest		; See if we REALLY linked in anything...
 30504                                  	jc	short husX	; ...if not, there's nothing for us to do.
 30505                                  
 30506                                  	call	FixMem		; Concatenate adjacent free MCBs in upper mem
 30507                                  	call	setUMBs		; Link UMBs and set memory-allocation strategy
 30508                                  
 30509                                  	;putdata fInHigh,1	; Remember that we're now running high
 30510                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],1
 30511                                  
 30512                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; See if they gave us a list to leave free
 30513                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30514                                  
 30515                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED	; If they didn't,
 30516                                  	je	short husX	; then we shouldn't do this loop:
 30517                                  
 30518                                  	xor	cx,cx
 30519                                  
 30520                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 30521                                  ; HUS10-CX - UMB number (after inc, 1==first UMB)
 30522                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 30523                                  
 30524                                  hus10:	inc	cx		; For each UMB:
 30525                                  	cmp	cx,MAXUMB ; 16
 30526                                  	jae	short hus20
 30527                                  
 30528                                  	mov	al,cl		; (stopping as soon as we're outside of the
 30529                                  	push	es
 30530                                  	call	findUMB		; valid range of UMBs)
 30531                                  	pop	es		; push/pop: trash what findumb finds.  :-)
 30532                                  	jc	short hus20
 30533                                  
 30534                                  	call	_hideUMB_	; hide what we need to hide.
 30535                                  
 30536                                  	jmp	short hus10
 30537                                  hus20:	
 30538                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; Now check if they offered /L:0
 30539                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 30540                                  
 30541                                  	or	al,al		; --Is the load UMB 0? (-1==unspecified)
 30542                                  	jnz	short husX	; If not, we're done.
 30543                                  
 30544                                  	call	hl_unlink	; If so, however, fix UMBs and strategy.
 30545                                  husX:	
 30546                                  	pop	es
 30547                                  	pop	ds
 30548                                  	pop	cx
 30549                                  	pop	ax
 30550                                  	retn
 30551                                  
 30552                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30553                                  ;*** GetLoadUMB - Returns the load UMB number in AL (-1 if not specified)
 30554                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30555                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30556                                  ; EXIT:   AL == load UMB
 30557                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30558                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30559                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30560                                  
 30561                                  ;GetLoadUMB:
 30562                                  ;	;getdata al, UmbLoad
 30563                                  ;	push	ds
 30564                                  ;	push	cs
 30565                                  ;	pop	ds
 30566                                  ;	mov	al,[UmLoad]
 30567                                  ;	pop	ds
 30568                                  ;	retn
 30569                                  
 30570                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30571                                  ;*** GetLoadSize - Returns the load UMB minimum size (0 if not specified)
 30572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30573                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30574                                  ; EXIT:   AX == load UMB minimum size
 30575                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30576                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30577                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30578                                  
 30579                                  GetLoadSize:
 30580                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30581                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30582                                  	jmp	short GetSize
 30583                                  
 30584                                  	;push	bx
 30585                                  	;;push	si
 30586                                  	;push	ds
 30587                                  	;push	cs
 30588                                  	;pop	ds
 30589                                  
 30590                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 30591                                  
 30592                                  	;xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 30593                                  	;mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 30594                                  	;shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 30595                                  	;;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 30596                                  	;;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 30597                                  
 30598                                  	;;lodsw				;    ax==size
 30599                                  
 30600                                  	;add	bx,ax
 30601                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 30602                                  
 30603                                  	;pop	ds
 30604                                  	;;pop	si
 30605                                  	;pop	bx
 30606                                  	;retn
 30607                                  
 30608                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30609                                  ;*** GetSize - Returns the UMB in AL's minimum size (0 if not specified)
 30610                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30611                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == a UMB number
 30612                                  ; EXIT:   AX == UMB minimum size, as specified by the user
 30613                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30614                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30615                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30616                                  
 30617                                  GetSize:
 30618                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30619                                  
 30620                                  	push	bx
 30621                                  	;push	si
 30622                                  	;push	ds
 30623                                  	;push	cs
 30624                                  	;pop	ds
 30625                                  
 30626                                  	xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 30627                                  	mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 30628                                  	shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 30629                                  	;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 30630                                  	;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 30631                                  
 30632                                  	;lodsw				;    ax==size
 30633                                  
 30634                                  	add	bx,ax
 30635                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 30636                                  	mov	ax,[cs:bx]
 30637                                  
 30638                                  	;pop	ds
 30639                                  	;pop	si
 30640                                  	pop	bx
 30641                                  	retn
 30642                                  
 30643                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30644                                  ;*** StoLoadUMB - Overrides the load UMB number with what's in AL
 30645                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30646                                  ; ENTRY:   AL == new load UMB
 30647                                  ; EXIT:    None
 30648                                  ; ERROR:   None
 30649                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX
 30650                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30651                                  ; CAUTION: Should only be used if /L:... was used.  Logically, that is the only
 30652                                  ;          time you would ever need this, so that's okay.
 30653                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30654                                  
 30655                                  ;StoLoadUMB:
 30656                                  ;	;putdata UmbLoad, al
 30657                                  ;	push	es
 30658                                  ;	push	cs
 30659                                  ;	pop	es
 30660                                  ;	mov	[es:UmbLoad],al
 30661                                  ;	pop	es
 30662                                  ;	retn
 30663                                  
 30664                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30665                                  ;*** StoLoadSize - Overrides the load UMB minimum size with what's in AX
 30666                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30667                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == new load size
 30668                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30669                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30670                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30671                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30672                                  
 30673                                  StoLoadSize:
 30674                                  	push	dx
 30675                                  
 30676                                  	;getdata dl, UmbLoad		; Put UMB# in DL and size in AX
 30677                                  	;
 30678                                  	;push	ds
 30679                                  	;push	cs
 30680                                  	;pop	ds
 30681                                  	;mov	dl,[UmbLoad]
 30682                                  	;pop	ds	
 30683                                  
 30684                                  	mov	dl,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30685                                  
 30686                                  	cmp	dl,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh
 30687                                  	je	short sls10
 30688                                  
 30689                                  	call	stowSiz			; We've got a function to do just this
 30690                                  sls10:	
 30691                                  	pop	dx
 30692                                  	retn
 30693                                  
 30694                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30695                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 30696                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30697                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 30698                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 30699                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30700                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30701                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30702                                  
 30703                                  hideUMB:
 30704                                  	push	ax
 30705                                  	push	es
 30706                                  
 30707                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30708                                  	jc	short huX
 30709                                  
 30710                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30711                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 30712                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 30713                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30714                                  
 30715                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30716                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 30717                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30718                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30719                                  	jnz	short hu20
 30720                                  
 30721                                  	call	hideMCB
 30722                                  hu20:	
 30723                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30724                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 30725                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30726                                  
 30727                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30728                                  	mov     ax,es
 30729                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30730                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30731                                  	inc     ax
 30732                                  	mov     es,ax
 30733                                  
 30734                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30735                                  huX:	
 30736                                  	pop	es
 30737                                  	pop	ax
 30738                                  	retn
 30739                                  
 30740                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30741                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30742                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30743                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30744                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30745                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30746                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30747                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30748                                  
 30749                                  isTiny:
 30750                                  	push	ax
 30751                                  
 30752                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30753                                  	;
 30754                                  	;push	ds
 30755                                  	;push	cs
 30756                                  	;pop	ds
 30757                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30758                                  	;pop	ds
 30759                                  
 30760                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30761                                  
 30762                                  	or	al,al
 30763                                  	pop	ax
 30764                                  	retn
 30765                                  
 30766                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30767                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30768                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30769                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30770                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30771                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30772                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30773                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30774                                  
 30775                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30776                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30777                                  ;	retn
 30778                                  
 30779                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30780                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30781                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30782                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30783                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30784                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30785                                  ; USES:     None
 30786                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30787                                  
 30788                                  hideMCB:
 30789                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30790                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30791                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30792                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30793                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30794                                  	retn
 30795                                  
 30796                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30797                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30798                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30799                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30800                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30801                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30802                                  ; USES:     None
 30803                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30804                                  
 30805                                  unHideMCB:
 30806                                  	push	ax
 30807                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30808                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30809                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30810                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30811                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30812                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30813                                  	pop	ax
 30814                                  	retn
 30815                                  
 30816                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30817                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30818                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30819                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30820                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30821                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30822                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30823                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30824                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30825                                  
 30826                                  findUMB:
 30827                                  	push	ax
 30828                                  	push	cx
 30829                                  	push	dx
 30830                                  
 30831                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30832                                  
 30833                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30834                                  
 30835                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30836                                  	mov	es,ax
 30837                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30838                                  
 30839                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30840                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30841                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30842                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30843                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30844                                  
 30845                                  fu10:	
 30846                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30847                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30848                                  
 30849                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30850                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30851                                  
 30852                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30853                                  fu20:	
 30854                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30855                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30856                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30857                                  
 30858                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30859                                  	mov     ax,es
 30860                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30861                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30862                                  	inc     ax
 30863                                  	mov     es,ax
 30864                                  
 30865                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30866                                  fuE:	
 30867                                  	stc
 30868                                  fuX:
 30869                                  	pop	dx
 30870                                  	pop	cx
 30871                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30872                                  	retn
 30873                                  
 30874                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30875                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30876                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30877                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30878                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30879                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30880                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30881                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30882                                  
 30883                                  BigFree:
 30884                                  	push	bx
 30885                                  	push	cx
 30886                                  
 30887                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30888                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30889                                  
 30890                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30891                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30892                                  
 30893                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30894                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30895                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30896                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30898                                  
 30899                                  bf10:	
 30900                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30901                                  	jz	short bf30
 30902                                  
 30903                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30904                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30905                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30906                                  
 30907                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30908                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30909                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30910                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30911                                  
 30912                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30913                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30914                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30915                                  
 30916                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30917                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30918                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30919                                  
 30920                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30921                                  	mov     ax,es
 30922                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30923                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30924                                  	inc     ax
 30925                                  	mov     es,ax
 30926                                  
 30927                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30928                                  
 30929                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30930                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30931                                  	or	bx,bx
 30932                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30933                                  bfE:	
 30934                                  	stc
 30935                                  bfX:
 30936                                  	pop	cx
 30937                                  	pop	bx
 30938                                  	retn
 30939                                  
 30940                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30941                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30942                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30943                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30944                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30945                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30946                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30947                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30948                                  
 30949                                  isSpecified:
 30950                                  	push	ax
 30951                                  
 30952                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30953                                  	mov	bl,al
 30954                                  
 30955                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30956                                  	;
 30957                                  	;push	ds
 30958                                  	;push	cs
 30959                                  	;pop	ds
 30960                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30961                                  	;pop	ds
 30962                                  	
 30963                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30964                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30965                                  
 30966                                  	pop	ax
 30967                                  	retn
 30968                                  
 30969                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30970                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30971                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30972                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30973                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30974                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30975                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30976                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30977                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30978                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30979                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30980                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30981                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30982                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30983                                  
 30984                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30985                                  
 30986                                  shrinkMCB:
 30987                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30988                                  	push	bx
 30989                                  	push	cx
 30990                                  	push	es
 30991                                  
 30992                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30993                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30994                                  
 30995                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30996                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30997                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30998                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30999                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31000                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 31001                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31002                                  
 31003                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31004                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31005                                  
 31006                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31007                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31008                                  
 31009                                  	add	ax,bx
 31010                                  	inc	ax
 31011                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31012                                  
 31013                                  	mov	ax,cx
 31014                                  	sub	ax,bx
 31015                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31016                                  	; ax > 0
 31017                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31018                                  
 31019                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31020                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31021                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31022                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31023                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31024                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31025                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31026                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31027                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31028                                  
 31029                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31030                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31031                                  
 31032                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31033                                  	; cf=0
 31034                                  	;clc
 31035                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31036                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31037                                  smE:	
 31038                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31039                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31040                                  	;stc
 31041                                  smX:	
 31042                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31043                                  	pop	es
 31044                                  	pop	cx
 31045                                  	pop	bx
 31046                                  	retn
 31047                                  
 31048                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31049                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31050                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31051                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31052                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31053                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31054                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31055                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31056                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31057                                  ;
 31058                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31059                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31060                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31061                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31062                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31063                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31064                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31065                                  ;       Endif
 31066                                  ;    Endif
 31067                                  ; Endif
 31068                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31069                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31070                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31071                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31072                                  ;    ENDIF
 31073                                  ; ENDIF
 31074                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31075                                  
 31076                                  _hideUMB_:
 31077                                  	push	bx
 31078                                  	push	dx
 31079                                  	push	es
 31080                                  
 31081                                  	mov	al,cl
 31082                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31083                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31084                                  
 31085                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31086                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31087                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31088                                  
 31089                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31090                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31091                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31092                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31093                                  
 31094                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31095                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31096                                  
 31097                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31098                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31099                                  
 31100                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31101                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31102                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31103                                  hu_10:	
 31104                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31105                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31106                                  
 31107                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31108                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31109                                  
 31110                                  	mov	dx,es
 31111                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31112                                  
 31113                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31114                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31115                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31116                                  
 31117                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31118                                  hu_30:	
 31119                                  	mov	al,cl
 31120                                  
 31121                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31122                                  
 31123                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31124                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31125                                  
 31126                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31127                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31128                                  hu_X:	
 31129                                  	pop	es
 31130                                  	pop	dx
 31131                                  	pop	bx
 31132                                  	retn
 31133                                  
 31134                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31135                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31136                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31137                                  ; Entry:  None
 31138                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31139                                  ; Error:  None
 31140                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31141                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31142                                  
 31143                                  UnFreeze:
 31144                                  	push	ax
 31145                                  	push	es
 31146                                  
 31147                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31148                                  	jc	short ufX
 31149                                  
 31150                                  	mov	es,ax
 31151                                  
 31152                                  ; ------------------------------
 31153                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31154                                  ; ------------------------------
 31155                                  
 31156                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31157                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31158                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31159                                  uf20:	
 31160                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31161                                  
 31162                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31163                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31164                                  
 31165                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31166                                  	mov     ax,es
 31167                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31168                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31169                                  	inc     ax
 31170                                  	mov     es,ax
 31171                                  
 31172                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31173                                  ufX:	
 31174                                  	pop	es
 31175                                  	pop	ax
 31176                                  	retn
 31177                                  
 31178                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31179                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31180                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31181                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31182                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31183                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31184                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31185                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31186                                  
 31187                                  isFrozMCB:
 31188                                  	;push	ax
 31189                                  
 31190                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31191                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31192                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31193                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31194                                  
 31195                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31196                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31197                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31198                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31199                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31200                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31201                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31202                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31203                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31204                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31205                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31206                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31207                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31208                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31209                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31210                                  ifmX:	
 31211                                  	;pop	ax
 31212                                  	retn
 31213                                  
 31214                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31215                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31217                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31218                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31219                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31220                                  ; USES:     None
 31221                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31222                                  
 31223                                  frezMCB:
 31224                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 31225                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31226                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31227                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31228                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31229                                  	retn
 31230                                  
 31231                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31232                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31233                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31234                                  ; Entry:  None
 31235                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31236                                  ; Error:  None
 31237                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31238                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31239                                  
 31240                                  FreezeUM:
 31241                                  	push	ax
 31242                                  	push	cx
 31243                                  	push	dx
 31244                                  	push	es
 31245                                  
 31246                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 31247                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31248                                  
 31249                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31250                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31251                                  
 31252                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31253                                  	mov	es,ax
 31254                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31255                                  
 31256                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31257                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31258                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31259                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31260                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31261                                  
 31262                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31263                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31264                                  
 31265                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31266                                  fum20:	
 31267                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31268                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31269                                  
 31270                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31271                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31272                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31273                                  
 31274                                  	call	frezMCB
 31275                                  fum30:	
 31276                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31277                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31278                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31279                                  
 31280                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31281                                  	mov     ax,es
 31282                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31283                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31284                                  	inc     ax
 31285                                  	mov     es,ax
 31286                                  	
 31287                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31288                                  
 31289                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31290                                  	pop	dx
 31291                                  	pop	cx
 31292                                  	pop	ax
 31293                                  	retn
 31294                                  
 31295                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31296                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31297                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31298                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31299                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31300                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31301                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31302                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31303                                  
 31304                                  UmbTest:
 31305                                  	push	ax
 31306                                  	push	bx
 31307                                  	push	ds
 31308                                  	push	es
 31309                                  
 31310                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31311                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31312                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31313                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31314                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31315                                  
 31316                                  	pop	es
 31317                                  	pop	ds
 31318                                  	pop	bx
 31319                                  	pop	ax
 31320                                  	retn
 31321                                  
 31322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31323                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31324                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31325                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31326                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31327                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31328                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31329                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31330                                  
 31331                                  WalkMem:
 31332                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31333                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31334                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31335                                  		   	
 31336                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31337                                  	int	21h
 31338                                  
 31339                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31340                                  	mov	es,ax
 31341
