 31342                                  ; ------------------------------
 31343                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31344                                  ; ------------------------------
 31345                                  
 31346                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31347                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31348                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31349                                  
 31350                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31351                                  
 31352                                  	mov     bx,es
 31353                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31354                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31355                                  	inc     bx
 31356                                  	mov     es,bx
 31357                                  		
 31358                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31359                                  um20:	
 31360                                  	mov	ax,es
 31361                                  
 31362                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31363                                  
 31364                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31365                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31366                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31367                                  	retn
 31368                                  
 31369                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31370                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31371                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31372                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31373                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31374                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31375                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31376                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31377                                  
 31378                                  hl_unlink:
 31379                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31380                                  
 31381                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31382                                  	;
 31383                                  	;push	ds
 31384                                  	;push	cs
 31385                                  	;pop	ds
 31386                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31387                                  	;pop	ds
 31388                                  
 31389                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31390                                  
 31391                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31392                                  	int	21h
 31393                                  	retn
 31394                                  
 31395                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31396                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31397                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31398                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31399                                  
 31400                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31401                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31402                                  
 31403                                  ;   Modification log:
 31404                                  ;
 31405                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31406                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31407                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31408                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31409                                  
 31410                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31411                                  
 31412                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31413                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31414                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31415                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31416                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31417                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31418                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31419                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31420                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31421                                  
 31422                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31423                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31424                                  
 31425                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31426                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31427                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31428                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31429                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31430                                  ;    every command execution.
 31431                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31432                                  
 31433                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31434                                  	;
 31435                                  	;push	ds
 31436                                  	;push	cs
 31437                                  	;pop	ds
 31438                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31439                                  	;pop	ds	
 31440                                  
 31441                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31442                                  
 31443                                  	or	al,al
 31444                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31445                                  
 31446                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31447                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31448                                  	retn			; that.
 31449                                  uhu10:	
 31450                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31451                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31452                                  
 31453                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31454                                  	;
 31455                                  	;push	es
 31456                                  	;push	cs
 31457                                  	;pop	es
 31458                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31459                                  	;pop	ds	
 31460                                  
 31461                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31462                                  
 31463                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31464                                  
 31465                                  	pop	ax
 31466                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31467                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31468                                  	retn
 31469                                  
 31470                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31471                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31472                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31473                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31474                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31475                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31476                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31477                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31478                                  
 31479                                  he_unlink:
 31480                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31481                                  
 31482                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31483                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31484                                  
 31485                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31486                                  	int	21h
 31487                                  	retn
 31488                                  
 31489                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31490                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31491                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31492                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31493                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31494                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31495                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31496                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31497                                  
 31498                                  FreeUMBs:
 31499                                  	push	ax
 31500                                  	push	es
 31501                                  
 31502                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31503                                  	jc	short fusX
 31504                                  
 31505                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31506                                  fus10:	
 31507                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31508                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31509                                  	call	freeMCB
 31510                                  fus20:	   
 31511                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31512                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31513                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31514                                  
 31515                                  	mov	ax,es
 31516                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31517                                  	inc	ax
 31518                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31519                                  
 31520                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31521                                  fusX:	
 31522                                  	pop	es
 31523                                  	pop	ax
 31524                                  	retn
 31525                                  
 31526                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31527                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31528                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31529                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31530                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31531                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31532                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31533                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31534                                  
 31535                                  isHideMCB:
 31536                                  	;push	ax
 31537                                  
 31538                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31539                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31540                                  
 31541                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31542                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31543                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31544                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31545                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31546                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31547                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31548                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31549                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31550                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31551                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31552                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31553                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31554                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31555                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31556                                  ihm_x:	
 31557                                  	;pop	ax
 31558                                  	retn
 31559                                  
 31560                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31561                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31562                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31563                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31564                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31565                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31566                                  ; USES:     AX
 31567                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31568                                  
 31569                                  freeMCB:
 31570                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31571                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31572                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31573                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31574                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31575                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31576                                  	retn
 31577                                  
 31578                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31579                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31580                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31581                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31582                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31583                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31584                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX

 31588                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31589

 31594

 31619                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31620                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31621                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31622                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31623                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31624                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31625                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31626                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31627                                  
 31628                                  linkumb:
 31629                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31630                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31631                                  
 31632                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31633                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31634                                  
 31635                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31636                                  	mov	bx,1
 31637                                  	int	21h
 31638                                  lumbX:
 31639                                  	retn

 31651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31652                                  ;
 31653                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31654                                  ;
 31655                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31656                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31657                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31658                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31659                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31660                                  ;
 31661                                  ;	Output : none
 31662                                  ;
 31663                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31664                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31665                                  ;
 31666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31667                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31668                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31669                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31670                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31672                                  
 31673                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31674                                  InitDevLoad:
 31675                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31676                                  	; ds = cs
 31677 0000276B 803E[7D1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31678                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31679                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31680 00002770 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31681                                  
 31682                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31683                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31684                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31685                                  ;
 31686                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31687                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31688                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31689                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31690                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31691                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31692                                  ;
 31693                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31694                                  ;
 31695                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31696                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31697                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31698                                  ;	pushf
 31699                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31700                                  ;	popf
 31701                                  ;
 31702                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31703                                  ;
 31704                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31705                                  
 31706                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31707                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31708                                  InitForConv:
 31709                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31710                                  	; ds = cs
 31711 00002772 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31712                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31713 00002775 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31714 00002777 E83C04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31715 0000277A E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31716 0000277D 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31717                                  					;  in low memory
 31718                                  InitForHi:
 31719                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31720                                  	; ds = cs
 31721                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31722                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31723                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31724 0000277F A1[731E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31725 00002782 8B16[6F1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31726 00002786 0316[711E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31727 0000278A EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31728                                  
 31729                                  InitForLo:
 31730                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31731                                  	; ds = cs
 31732                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31733 0000278C C606[7D1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31734                                  initforlo_x:
 31735                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31736                                  	; ds = cs
 31737                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31738                                  					;  we are loading low
 31739                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31740                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31741 00002791 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31742 00002794 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31743                                  idl1:
 31744 00002798 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31745                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31746                                  	; ds = cs
 31747                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31748                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31749                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31750                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31751 0000279B A3[621E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31752 0000279E 8916[641E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31753 000027A2 C706[661E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31754 000027A8 A3[681E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31755 000027AB C3                      	retn
 31756                                  
 31757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31758                                  ;
 31759                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31760                                  ;
 31761                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31762                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31763                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31764                                  ;		   current UMB
 31765                                  ;
 31766                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31767                                  
 31768                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31769                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31770                                  	; ds = cs
 31771                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31772                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31773                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31774 000027AC A1[711E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31775 000027AF 0306[6F1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31776 000027B3 2B06[731E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31777                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31778                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31779                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31780                                  	;stc
 31781                                  	;retn
 31782                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31783 000027B7 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31784 000027BA 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31785                                  spcinumb1:
 31786 000027BC 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31787                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31788                                  	; ds = cs
 31789 000027BD 3B06[601E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31790                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31791                                  spcinumb2:
 31792 000027C1 C3                      	retn
 31793

 31797                                  ;
 31798                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31799                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31800                                  ;

 31808                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8

 31810                                  ;	pop	ds

 31813                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 31818                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31819                                  ;
 31820                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31821                                  ;
 31822                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31823                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31824                                  ;		 the device.
 31825                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31826                                  ;
 31827                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31828                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31829                                  ;	UMB.
 31830                                  ;
 31831                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31832                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31833                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31834                                  ;
 31835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31836                                  
 31837                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31838                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31839                                  
 31840                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31841                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31842                                  	; ds = cs
 31843 000027C2 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31844 000027C5 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31845 000027C8 CD21                    	int	21h
 31846                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31847                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31848                                  
 31849 000027CA 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31850                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 31851                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31852 000027CC 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 31853                                  
 31854 000027CE 4B                      	dec	bx
 31855                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31856                                  	; ds = cs
 31857 000027CF 391E[601E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31858                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31859 000027D3 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31860                                  
 31861 000027D5 43                      	inc	bx
 31862                                  
 31863 000027D6 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31864 000027D9 CD21                    	int	21h
 31865 000027DB 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31866                                  
 31867                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31868                                  	;dec	ax
 31869                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31870                                  	;
 31871                                  PrepareMark:
 31872 000027DD 1E                      	push	ds
 31873 000027DE 48                      	dec	ax
 31874 000027DF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31875 000027E1 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31876 000027E7 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31877 000027ED 40                      	inc	ax
 31878 000027EE 1F                      	pop	ds
 31879                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31880                                  	; ds = cs
 31881                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31882                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31883                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31884                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 31885 000027EF 891E[711E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31886 000027F3 A3[6F1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31887 000027F6 A3[731E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31888                                  	;
 31889                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31890                                  	; cf=0
 31891                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31892 000027F9 C3                      	retn
 31893                                  
 31894                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31895                                  %if 1
 31896                                  gufd_err:
 31897 000027FA 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 31898                                  gufd_error:
 31899 000027FC 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31900 000027FE F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 31901 000027FF EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 31902                                  %endif
 31903                                  
 31904                                  ; 09/09/2023
 31905                                  %if 0
 31906                                  gufd_err:
 31907                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31908                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31909                                  	; ds = cs
 31910                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31911                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31912                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31913                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31914                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31915                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31916                                  	stc
 31917                                  	retn
 31918                                  %endif

 31921                                  ;
 31922                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31923                                  ;
 31924                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31925                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31926                                  ;
 31927                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31928                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31929                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31930                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31931                                  ;
 31932                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31933                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31934                                  ;
 31935                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31936                                  
 31937                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31938                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31939                                  
 31940                                  DevSetMark:
 31941 00002801 06                      	push	es
 31942 00002802 57                      	push	di
 31943 00002803 1E                      	push	ds
 31944 00002804 56                      	push	si
 31945 00002805 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31946 00002807 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31947 0000280D 40                      	inc	ax
 31948 0000280E 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31949                                  
 31950                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31951                                  
 31952 00002812 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31953                                  	
 31954                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31955                                  	; ds = cs
 31956                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31957 00002813 C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 31958                                  
 31959 00002817 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31960 00002819 FC                      	cld
 31961                                  dsm_again:
 31962 0000281A AC                      	lodsb
 31963 0000281B 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31964 0000281D 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31965 0000281F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31966 00002821 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31967                                  isit_slash:
 31968 00002823 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31969 00002825 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31970 00002827 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31971 00002829 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31972                                  isit_null:
 31973 0000282B 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31974 0000282D 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31975 0000282F 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31976                                  
 31977 00002831 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31978 00002834 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31979                                  dsm_next_char:
 31980 00002837 AC                      	lodsb
 31981 00002838 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31982 0000283A 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31983 0000283C 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31984 0000283E 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31985 00002840 AA                      	stosb
 31986 00002841 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31987                                  blankout:
 31988 00002843 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31989 00002845 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31990 00002847 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31991                                  dsm_exit:
 31992 00002849 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31993 0000284A 5E                      	pop	si
 31994 0000284B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31995 0000284C 5F                      	pop	di
 31996 0000284D 07                      	pop	es
 31997 0000284E C3                      	retn

 31999                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32000                                  ;
 32001                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32002                                  ;
 32003                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32004                                  ;
 32005                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32006                                  ;
 32007                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32008                                  ;	in DevSize
 32009                                  ;
 32010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32011                                  
 32012                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32013                                  SizeDevice:
 32014                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32015                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32016 0000284F 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32017 00002850 06                      	push	es
 32018 00002851 1F                      	pop	ds
 32019 00002852 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32020 00002854 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32021 00002857 CD21                    	int	21h
 32022 00002859 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32023                                  
 32024 0000285B 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32025 0000285D B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32026 00002860 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32027 00002862 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32028 00002864 CD21                    	int	21h
 32029 00002866 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32030 00002868 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32031 0000286B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32032 0000286E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32033 00002872 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32034 00002874 2EC706[601E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32035                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32036 0000287B EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32037                                  szdev1:
 32038 0000287D B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32039 0000287F D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32040 00002881 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32041 00002883 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32042 00002885 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32043                                  	;
 32044                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32045 00002887 2E3B06[7E1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32046                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 32047                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32048 0000288C 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32049                                  
 32050 0000288E 2EA1[7E1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32051                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32052 00002892 F8                      	clc
 32053                                  szdev2:
 32054 00002893 2EA3[601E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32055                                  
 32056                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32057                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32058                                  	; cf=0
 32059                                  	;clc
 32060                                  sd_close:
 32061 00002897 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32062                                  					;  carry flag
 32063 00002898 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32064 0000289B CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32065 0000289D 9D                      	popf
 32066                                  sd_err:
 32067                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32068                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32069 0000289E 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32070 0000289F C3                      	retn
 32071                                  
 32072                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32073                                  ;
 32074                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32075                                  ;
 32076                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32077                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32080                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32081                                  ;
 32082                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 32083                                  ;
 32084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32085                                  
 32086                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32087                                  ExecDev:
 32088 000028A0 2E8B1E[621E]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]
 32089 000028A5 2E891E[791E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecAddr],bx	; Load the parameter block
 32090                                  					;  block for exec with

 32431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32432                                  ;
 32433                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32434                                  ;
 32435                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32436                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32437                                  ;
 32438                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32439                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32440                                  ;
 32441                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32442                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32443                                  ;
 32444                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32445                                  
 32446                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32447                                  
 32448                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32449                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32450                                  GetHexNum:
 32451 00002982 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32452 00002984 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32453                                  ghn_next:
 32454 00002986 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32455 00002989 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32456 0000298C 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32457 0000298E 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32458 00002991 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32459 00002993 50                      	push	ax
 32460 00002994 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32461 00002996 E82006                  	call	delim
 32462 00002999 58                      	pop	ax
 32463                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32464 0000299A B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32465 0000299D 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32466 0000299F E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32467                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32468                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32469 000029A2 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32470                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32471                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32472                                  ghn_shift1:
 32473 000029A4 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32474 000029A6 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32475 000029A8 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32476 000029AA 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32477 000029AC 46                      	inc	si
 32478 000029AD EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32479                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32480 000029AF 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32481 000029B2 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32482 000029B5 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32483 000029B9 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32484                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32485                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32486                                  ghn_shift2:
 32487 000029BB F8                      	clc
 32488 000029BC D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32489 000029BE D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32490 000029C0 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32491 000029C2 F8                      	clc
 32492 000029C3 C3                      	retn
 32493                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32494                                  ghn_err:
 32495                                  gnib_err:
 32496 000029C4 F9                      	stc
 32497                                  ghn_ret:
 32498                                  gnib_ret:
 32499 000029C5 C3                      	retn
 32500                                  
 32501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32502                                  ;
 32503                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32504                                  ;
 32505                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32506                                  ;
 32507                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32508                                  ;
 32509                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32510                                  ;
 32511                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32512                                  
 32513                                  GetNibble:
 32514 000029C6 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32515                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32516                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32517 000029C9 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32518 000029CB 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32519 000029CE 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32520 000029D0 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32521 000029D3 C3                      	retn
 32522                                  is_it_hex:
 32523 000029D4 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32524                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32525                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32526 000029D7 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32527 000029D9 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32528 000029DC 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32529 000029DE 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32530 000029E1 C3                      	retn
 32531                                  
 32532                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32533                                  ;gnib_err:
 32534                                  ;	stc
 32535                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32536                                  ;	retn

 32550                                  
 32551                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32552                                  ;
 32553                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32554                                  ;
 32555                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32556                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32557                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32558                                  ;			; DS = data
 32559                                  ;
 32560                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32561                                  ;
 32562                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32563                                  ;
 32564                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32565                                  
 32566                                  umb_insert:
 32567 000029E2 1E                      	push	ds
 32568                                  
 32569                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32570                                  	; ds = cs
 32571                                  
 32572                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32573 000029E3 8E1E[8C1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32574                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32575 000029E7 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32576 000029EB 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32577 000029ED 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32578                                  ui_next:
 32579 000029EF 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32580                                  					;    new block
 32581 000029F1 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32582                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32583                                  					;    last
 32584 000029F3 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32585 000029F9 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32586                                  					; N: get next block
 32587 000029FB 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32588                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32589 000029FD E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32590 00002A00 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32591                                  
 32592                                  ui_insert:
 32593 00002A02 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32594 00002A04 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32595                                  
 32596 00002A05 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32597 00002A07 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32598                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32599 00002A09 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32600                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32601 00002A0E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32602                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32603 00002A14 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32604                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32605 00002A18 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32606                                  
 32607                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32608                                  
 32609 00002A1E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32610 00002A20 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32611 00002A26 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32612                                  					; mark as free
 32613 00002A2D 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32614                                  					; start & end of new block
 32615 00002A30 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32616                                  
 32617                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32618                                  	
 32619 00002A35 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32620 00002A37 43                      	inc	bx
 32621 00002A38 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32622 00002A3A 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32623                                  
 32624                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32625                                  					; this block
 32626 00002A3B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32627                                  	
 32628 00002A3D 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32629 00002A43 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32630 00002A4A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32631 00002A4E 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32632                                  
 32633 00002A55 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32634                                  
 32635                                  ui_append:
 32636                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32637 00002A57 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32638 00002A5C 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32639                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32640                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32641                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32642 00002A62 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32643                                  
 32644 00002A68 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32645 00002A6A 40                      	inc	ax
 32646 00002A6B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32647                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32648 00002A6D F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32649                                  
 32650 00002A6F 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32651                                  
 32652 00002A71 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32653 00002A77 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32654 00002A7E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32655 00002A82 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32656                                  
 32657                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32658 00002A89 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32659 00002A8B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32660 00002A91 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32661                                  					; mark as free
 32662 00002A98 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32663 00002A99 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32664                                  ui_done:
 32665                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32666 00002A9E 1F                      	pop	ds
 32667                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32668                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32669                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 32670 00002A9F C3                      	retn

 32685                                  au_next:

 32696                                  ;	retn
 32697                                  
 32698                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32699                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 32700                                  
 32701                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32702                                  
 32703                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32704                                  ;
 32705                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32706                                  ;
 32707                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32708                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32709                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32710                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32711                                  ;
 32712                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32713                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32714                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32715                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32716                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32717                                  ;
 32718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32719                                  
 32720                                  umb_coalesce:
 32721                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32722                                  	; ds = cs
 32723 00002AAF 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32724                                  
 32725 00002AB0 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32726                                  
 32727                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32728                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32729 00002AB2 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32730 00002AB6 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32731                                  uc_nextfree:
 32732 00002ABB 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32733 00002ABD 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32734                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32735 00002ABF 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32736 00002AC4 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32737                                  					; N: get next arena
 32738 00002AC6 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32739 00002AC9 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32740 00002ACB EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32741                                  uc_again:
 32742 00002ACD E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32743 00002AD0 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32744                                  uc_check:
 32745 00002AD2 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32746 00002AD7 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32747                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32748 00002AD9 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32749 00002ADE 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32750                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32751 00002ADF 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32752 00002AE3 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32753 00002AE6 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32754 00002AE8 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32755                                  
 32756                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32757                                  ;uc_done:
 32758                                  	;retn

 32776 00002AF3 8C06[8C1E]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 32777 00002AF7 B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 32778 00002AFA CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 32780                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 32781 00002AFC 891E[751E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 32782 00002B00 8C06[771E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 32783                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32784 00002B04 803E[8B1E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0

 32808                                  ;
 32809                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32810                                  ;
 32811                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32812                                  ;
 32813                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32814                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32815                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32816                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32817                                  ;				NC
 32818                                  ;			  else 
 32819                                  ;				CY
 32820                                  ;
 32821                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32822                                  ;
 32823                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32824                                  
 32825                                  umb_allocate:
 32826                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32827                                  	; ds = cs
 32828 00002B18 50                      	push	ax
 32829 00002B19 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32830 00002B1B BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32831                                  					;   possible
 32832                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32833 00002B1E FF1E[751E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32834                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32835                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32836                                  					; the largest UMB
 32837 00002B22 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32838 00002B24 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32839                                  	
 32840 00002B26 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32841                                  
 32842                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32843 00002B28 FF1E[751E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32844                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32845                                  
 32846 00002B2C 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32847                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32848                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32849 00002B2F 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32850                                  ua_err:
 32851 00002B31 F9                      	stc	
 32852                                  
 32853                                  	;clc
 32854                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32855                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32856                                  	; cf=0
 32857                                  	;clc 
 32858                                  ua_done:
 32859 00002B32 58                      	pop	ax
 32860 00002B33 C3                      	retn
 32861                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32862                                  ;ua_err:
 32863                                  	;stc
 32864                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 32871                                  ;

 32874                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged

 32878                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32879                                  get_next:
 32880 00002B34 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32881 00002B39 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32882                                  _get_next_:
 32883 00002B3B 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32884 00002B3D 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32885 00002B41 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32886 00002B42 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32887                                  	;clc

 32889                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32890                                  	; cf=0
 32891                                  	;clc
 32892 00002B44 C3                      	retn

 32894 00002B45 F9                      	stc
 32895                                  	; 11/12/2022

 32901                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32902                                  ;
 32903                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32904                                  
 32905                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32906                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32907                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32908                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32909                                  	; ds = cs
 32910 00002B47 E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 32911 00002B4A 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32912                                  
 32913                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32914                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32915                                  
 32916                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32917                                  	; ds = cs
 32918                                  
 32919 00002B4C CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32920 00002B4E B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32921 00002B50 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32922                                  
 32923 00002B52 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32924 00002B54 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32925                                  
 32926 00002B56 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32927                                  
 32928                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32929                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32930 00002B58 49                      	dec	cx
 32931 00002B59 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32932                                  	
 32933 00002B5B 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32934 00002B61 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32935                                  					
 32936 00002B68 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32937 00002B6C 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32938                                  
 32939                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32940                                  
 32941 00002B73 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32942 00002B75 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32943 00002B7B 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32944                                  					; mark as free 
 32945 00002B82 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32946 00002B83 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32947                                  
 32948                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32949                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32950 00002B88 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32951                                  	; 18/09/2023
 32952 00002B8C 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 32953                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32954                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32955                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32956                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32957                                  
 32958                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32959                                  
 32960                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32961                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32962                                  	; 18/09/2023
 32963 00002B91 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32964 00002B96 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32965                                  ;scan_next
 32966                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32967                                  scannext:
 32968 00002B98 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32969 00002B9C 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32970                                  	
 32971 00002B9E 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32972 00002BA0 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32973 00002BA5 40                      	inc	ax
 32974 00002BA6 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32975                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32976                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32977 00002BA8 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32978                                  got_last:
 32979                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32980                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32981 00002BAA 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32982                                  
 32983 00002BAF 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32984                                  	;clc
 32985                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32986                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32987                                  	; cf=0
 32988                                  	;clc
 32989 00002BB5 C3                      	retn
 32990                                  
 32991                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32992                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32993                                  ;	;stc
 32994                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32995                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32996                                  ;	; cf=1
 32997                                  ;	;stc
 32998                                  ;	retn

 33000                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33001                                  ;
 33002                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33003                                  ;
 33004                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33005                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33006                                  ;
 33007                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33008                                  
 33009                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33010                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33011                                  	; ds = cs
 33012 00002BB6 833E[6F1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33013                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33014 00002BBB 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 33015 00002BBD 06                      	push	es
 33016 00002BBE 53                      	push	bx
 33017                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33018                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33019                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33020                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33021 00002BBF 8B1E[731E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33022 00002BC3 2B1E[6F1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33023 00002BC7 8E06[6F1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33024                                  	
 33025 00002BCB B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33026 00002BCE CD21                    	int	21h
 33027                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33028                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33029                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33030 00002BD0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33031 00002BD2 48                      	dec	ax
 33032 00002BD3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33033 00002BD5 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33034 00002BDC 5B                      	pop	bx
 33035 00002BDD 07                      	pop	es
 33036                                  su_exit:
 33037 00002BDE C3                      	retn
 33038
