 34967                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34968                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34969                                          push    cs              ;
 34970                                          pop     es              ;
 34971                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34972                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34973                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34974                                          je	short l2	;
 34975                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34976                                          inc     si              ;
 34977                                          inc     di              ;
 34978                                          loop    l1              ;
 34979                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34980                                          pop     es              ;
 34981                                  
 34982                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34983                                  
 34984                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34985                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34986                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34987                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34988                                  
 34989                                          push    cx              ;
 34990                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34991                                          pop     cx              ;
 34992                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34993                                          pop     ds              ;
 34994                                  
 34995                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34996                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34997                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34998                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34999                                  ;   is empty.
 35000                                  
 35001                                          push    es              ;
 35002                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35003                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35004                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35005                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35006                                          pop     es
 35007                                  
 35008                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35009                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35010                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35011                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35012                                  
 35013                                  menu_done:
 35014                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35015                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 35016                                          push    es              ;
 35017                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35018                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35019                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35020                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35021                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35022                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35023                                          pop     es              ;
 35024                                  menu_exit:
 35025                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35026                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35027                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35028                                          retn
 35029                                  
 35030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35031                                  ;
 35032                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35033                                  ;
 35034                                  ;   INPUT
 35035                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35036                                  ;
 35037                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35038                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35039                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35040                                  ;
 35041                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35042                                  ;       None
 35043                                  ;
 35044                                  ;   NOTES
 35045                                  ;       None
 35046                                  ;
 35047                                  ;   HISTORY
 35048                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35049                                  ;
 35050                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35051                                  
 35052                                  copy_envvar:
 35053                                          push    cx              ;
 35054                                          push    si              ;
 35055                                          push    ds              ;
 35056                                          push    es              ;
 35057                                          push    es              ;
 35058                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35059                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35060                                  
 35061                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35062                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35063                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35064                                  ;
 35065                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35066                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35067                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35068                                  
 35069                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 35070                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35071                                          lodsb                   ;
 35072                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35073                                          stc                     ;
 35074                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35075                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 35076                                          stc                     ;
 35077                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35078                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 35079                                          stc                     ;
 35080                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35081                                          inc     cx              ;
 35082                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 35083                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 35084                                          mov     al,0            ;
 35085                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35086                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35087                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35088                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35089                                  copy_varsrch:
 35090                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35091                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35092                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35093                                          push    cx              ;
 35094                                          push    si              ;
 35095                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 35096                                          pop     si              ;
 35097                                          pop     cx              ;
 35098                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35099                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35100                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35101                                  
 35102                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35103                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35104                                  
 35105                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35106                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35107                                          push    si              ;
 35108                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35109                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 35110                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35111                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35112                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35113                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35114                                  
 35115                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 35116                                  	es	; 26h
 35117                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 35118                                  
 35119                                  	pop     si
 35120                                  copy_envprep:
 35121                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35122                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35123                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35124                                          je	short copy_envdel
 35125                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35126                                  
 35127                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35128                                          push    cx              ;
 35129                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35130                                          repne   scasb           ;
 35131                                          pop     cx              ;
 35132                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35133                                  
 35134                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 35135                                          lodsb                   ;
 35136                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 35137                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35138                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 35139                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35140                                          stosb                   ;
 35141                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35142                                  
 35143                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35144                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 35145                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35146                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35147                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35148                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35149                                  
 35150                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 35151                                          pop     es              ;
 35152                                          pop     ds              ;
 35153                                          pop     si              ;
 35154                                          pop     cx              ;
 35155                                  
 35156                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35157                                          retn
 35158                                  
 35159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35160                                  ;
 35161                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 35162                                  ;
 35163                                  ;   INPUT
 35164                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35165                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35166                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 35167                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 35168                                  ;
 35169                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35170                                  ;       Same as above
 35171                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 35172                                  ;
 35173                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35174                                  ;       All
 35175                                  ;
 35176                                  ;   NOTES
 35177                                  ;       None
 35178                                  ;
 35179                                  ;   HISTORY
 35180                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35183                                  
 35184                                  copy_block:
 35185                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 35186                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 35187                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35188                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 35189                                          je	short copy_done ;
 35190                                  
 35191                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 35192                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 35193                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 35194                                  
 35195                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 35196                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 35197                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 35198                                  
 35199                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 35200                                          push    di              ;
 35201                                  
 35202                                          mov     di,szMenu
 35203                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 35204                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35205                                  
 35206                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35207                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 35208                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35209                                  
 35210                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 35211                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35212                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 35213                                          pop     di              ;
 35214                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 35215                                          push    cx              ;
 35216                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 35217                                          push    si              ;
 35218                                          dec     dx              ;
 35219                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 35220                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 35221                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 35222                                          pop     si              ;
 35223                                          pop     cx              ;
 35224                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 35225                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35226                                  
 35227                                  copy_skip:
 35228                                          pop     di
 35229                                  copy_error:
 35230                                          clc                     ;
 35231                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 35232                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35233                                  
 35234                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 35235                                  
 35236                                  copy_line:
 35237                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35238                                          inc     di              ;
 35239                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 35240                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 35241                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 35242                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 35243                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 35244                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 35245                                          inc     di              ;
 35246                                          inc     di              ;
 35247                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 35248                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 35249                                          call    get_char        ;
 35250                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 35251                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35252                                          inc     di              ;
 35253                                  copy_next:
 35254                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 35255                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 35256                                  
 35257                                  copy_nextline:
 35258                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35259                                          jmp     short copy_block
 35260                                  
 35261                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35262                                  ;copy_done:
 35263                                          ;retn
 35264                                  
 35265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35266                                  ;
 35267                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 35268                                  ;
 35269                                  ;   INPUT
 35270                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 35271                                  ;
 35272                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35273                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 35274                                  ;
 35275                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35276                                  ;       DX
 35277                                  ;
 35278                                  ;   NOTES
 35279                                  ;       None
 35280                                  ;
 35281                                  ;   HISTORY
 35282                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35283                                  ;
 35284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35285                                  
 35286                                  get_linenum:
 35287                                          push    ax              ;
 35288                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 35289                                          push    cx              ;
 35290                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 35291                                          push    si              ;
 35292                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35293                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 35294                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 35295                                          call    skip_line       ;
 35296                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 35297                                          inc     bx              ;
 35298                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 35299                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 35300                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 35301                                          pop     si              ;
 35302                                          pop     cx              ;
 35303                                          pop     ax              ;
 35304                                          retn
 35305                                  
 35306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35307                                  ;
 35308                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 35309                                  ;
 35310                                  ;   INPUT
 35311                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 35312                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 35313                                  ;
 35314                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35315                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 35316                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 35317                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 35318                                  ;
 35319                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35320                                  ;       None
 35321                                  ;
 35322                                  ;   NOTES
 35323                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 35324                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 35325                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 35326                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 35327                                  ;
 35328                                  ;   HISTORY
 35329                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35330                                  ;
 35331                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35332                                  
 35333                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 35334                                          push    ax              ;
 35335                                          push    cx              ;
 35336                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35337                                          push    si              ;
 35338                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35339                                          push    ds              ;
 35340                                          push    es              ;
 35341                                          pop     ds              ;
 35342                                          call    find_block      ;
 35343                                          mov     di,si           ;
 35344                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 35345                                          pop     ds              ;
 35346                                          pop     si              ;
 35347                                          pop     cx              ;
 35348                                          pop     ax              ;
 35349                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 35350                                          retn			;
 35351                                  
 35352                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35353                                  ;
 35354                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ;   INPUT
 35357                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 35358                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 35359                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 35360                                  ;
 35361                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35362                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 35363                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35364                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35365                                  ;
 35366                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35367                                  ;       AX
 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ;   NOTES
 35370                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 35371                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 35372                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 35373                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 35374                                  ;
 35375                                  ;   HISTORY
 35376                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35377                                  ;
 35378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35379                                  
 35380                                  find_block:
 35381                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35382                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35383                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35384                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35385                                          je	short check_line ; no
 35386                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35387                                          jne	short next_line	;
 35388                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35389                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 35390                                  check_line:
 35391                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35392                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35393                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35394                                  next_line:
 35395                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35396                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 35397                                  ;find_exit:
 35398                                  ;	retn
 35399                                  
 35400                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35401                                  ;
 35402                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;   INPUT
 35405                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35406                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35407                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35408                                  ;
 35409                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35410                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35411                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35412                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35413                                  ;
 35414                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35415                                  ;       AX
 35416                                  ;
 35417                                  ;   NOTES
 35418                                  ;       None
 35419                                  ;
 35420                                  ;   HISTORY
 35421                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35424                                  
 35425                                  comp_names:
 35426                                          push    di              ;
 35427                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35428                                          call    get_char        ;
 35429                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 35430                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35431                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35432                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35433                                          inc     di              ;
 35434                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35435                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35436                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35437                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35438                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35439                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35440                                          pop     di              ;
 35441                                          retn			;
 35442                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35443                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35444                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35445                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35446                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35447                                  
 35448                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35449                                  
 35450                                  comp_names_safe:
 35451                                          push    ax
 35452                                          push    cx
 35453                                          push	si
 35454                                          push    ds
 35455                                          push    cs
 35456                                          pop     ds
 35457                                          call    comp_names
 35458                                          pop     ds
 35459                                  	pop	si
 35460                                          pop     cx
 35461                                          pop     ax
 35462                                          retn
 35463                                  
 35464                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35467                                  ;
 35468                                  ;   INPUT
 35469                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35470                                  ;
 35471                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35472                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35473                                  ;
 35474                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35475                                  ;       None
 35476                                  ;
 35477                                  ;   NOTES
 35478                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35479                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35480                                  ;
 35481                                  ;   HISTORY
 35482                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35483                                  ;
 35484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35485                                  
 35486                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35487                                          push    ax              ;
 35488                                          push    bx              ;
 35489                                          push    cx              ;
 35490                                          push    dx              ;
 35491                                          push    si              ;
 35492                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35493                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35494                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35495                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35496                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35497                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35498                                          add     dh,3            ;
 35499                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 35500                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35501                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35502                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35503                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35504                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35505                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35506                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35507                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 35508                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35509                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 35510                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35511                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35512                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35513                                  print_other:                    ;
 35514                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 35515                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35516                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35517                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35518                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35519                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35520                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35521                                          int     10h             ;
 35522                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35523                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35524                                          int     10h             ;
 35525                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35526                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35527                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35528                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35529                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35530                                          int     10h             ;
 35531                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35532                                          mov	ax,0920h
 35533                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35534                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35535                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35536                                          int     10h             ;
 35537                                          push    es              ;
 35538                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35539                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35540                                          inc     di              ;
 35541                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35542                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35543                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35544                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35545                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35546                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35547                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35548                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35549                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35550                                          int     10h             ;
 35551                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35552                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35553                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35554                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35555                                          int     10h             ;
 35556                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35557                                  print_done:                     ;
 35558                                          pop     es              ;
 35559                                          pop     dx              ;
 35560                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35561                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35562                                          pop     si              ;
 35563                                          pop     dx              ;
 35564                                          pop     cx              ;
 35565                                          pop     bx              ;
 35566                                          pop     ax              ;
 35567                                          retn			;
 35568                                  
 35569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35570                                  ;
 35571                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35572                                  ;
 35573                                  ;   INPUT
 35574                                  ;       None
 35575                                  ;
 35576                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35577                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35578                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35579                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35580                                  ;
 35581                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35582                                  ;       None
 35583                                  ;
 35584                                  ;   NOTES
 35585                                  ;       None
 35586                                  ;
 35587                                  ;   HISTORY
 35588                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35589                                  ;
 35590                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35591                                  
 35592                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35593                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35594                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35595                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35596                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35597                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35598                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35599                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35600                                          int     21h             ;
 35601                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35602                                  check_time:
 35603                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35604                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35605                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35606                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35607                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35608                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35609                                  show_time:
 35610                                          push    bx              ;
 35611                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35612                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35613                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35614                                          int     10h             ;
 35615                                          push    dx              ;
 35616                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35617                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35618                                          int     10h             ;
 35619                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35620                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35621                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35622                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35623                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35624                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35625                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35626                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35627                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35628                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35629                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35630                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35631                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35632                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35633                                          pop     dx
 35634                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35635                                          int     10h             ;
 35636                                          pop     bx              ;
 35637                                  input_key:
 35638                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35639                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35640                                          int     21h             ;
 35641                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35642                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35643                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35644                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35645                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35646                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35647                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35648                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35649                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35650                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35651                                  got_time:
 35652                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35653                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35654                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35655                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35656                                  got_key:
 35657                                          push    ax              ;
 35658                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35659                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35660                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35661                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35662                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35663                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35664                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35665                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35666                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35667                                          pop     bx   		;
 35668                                  
 35669                                  timeout_disabled:
 35670                                          pop     ax              ;
 35671                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35672                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35673                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35674                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35675                                  
 35676                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35677                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35678                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35679                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35680                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35681                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35682                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35683                                          jmp     short print1
 35684                                  not_up:
 35685                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35686                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35687                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35688                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35689                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35690                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35691                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35692                                  print1: 
 35693                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35694                                  print2: 
 35695                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35696                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35697                                  to_input_key:
 35698                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35699                                  not_down:
 35700                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35701                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35702                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35703                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35704                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35705                                          call    show_status     ;
 35706                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35707                                  not_f8:
 35708                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35709                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35710                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35711                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35712                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35713                                  
 35714                                  normal_key:
 35715                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35716                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35717                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35718                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35719                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35720                                          retn			;
 35721                                  not_backspace:
 35722                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35723                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35724                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35725                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35726                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35727                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35728                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35729                                          jmp	short print2
 35730                                  
 35731                                  select_done:
 35732                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35733                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35734                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35735                                  
 35736                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35737                                  
 35738                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35739                                  
 35740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35741                                  ;
 35742                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35743                                  ;
 35744                                  ;   INPUT
 35745                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35746                                  ;
 35747                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35748                                  ;       None
 35749                                  ;
 35750                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35751                                  ;       None
 35752                                  ;
 35753                                  ;   NOTES
 35754                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35755                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35756                                  ;
 35757                                  ;   HISTORY
 35758                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35759                                  ;
 35760                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35761                                  
 35762                                  disp_input:
 35763                                          push    ax
 35764                                          cmp     al,' '
 35765                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35766                                          mov     al,' '
 35767                                  disp_ok:
 35768                                          mov     dl,al
 35769                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35770                                          int     21h
 35771                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35772                                          call    print
 35773                                          pop     ax
 35774                                          retn
 35775                                  
 35776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35777                                  
 35778                                  disp_num:
 35779                                          push    bx
 35780                                          add     al,'0'
 35781                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35782                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35783                                          mov     cx,1
 35784                                          int     10h
 35785                                          pop     bx
 35786                                          retn
 35787                                  
 35788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35789                                  ;
 35790                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35791                                  ;
 35792                                  ;   INPUT
 35793                                  ;       None
 35794                                  ;
 35795                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35796                                  ;       None
 35797                                  ;
 35798                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35799                                  ;       None
 35800                                  ;
 35801                                  ;   NOTES
 35802                                  ;       None
 35803                                  ;
 35804                                  ;   HISTORY
 35805                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35806                                  ;
 35807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35808                                  
 35809                                  show_status:
 35810                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35811                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35812                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35813                                          int     10h             ;
 35814                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35815                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35816                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35817                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35818                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35819                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35820                                          int     10h             ;
 35821                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35822                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35823                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35824                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35825                                  show_onoff: 
 35826                                          int     10h
 35827                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35828                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35829                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35830                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35831                                  
 35832                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35833                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35834                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35835                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35836                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35837                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35838                                          int     10h             ;
 35839                                  show_done:                      ;
 35840                                          pop     dx              ;
 35841                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35842                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35843                                          pop     bx              ;
 35844                                          retn			;
 35845                                  
 35846                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35847                                  
 35848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35849                                  ;
 35850                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35851                                  ;
 35852                                  ;   INPUT
 35853                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35854                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35855                                  ;
 35856                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35857                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35858                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35859                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35860                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35861                                  ;
 35862                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35863                                  ;       AX
 35864                                  ;
 35865                                  ;   NOTES
 35866                                  ;       None
 35867                                  ;
 35868                                  ;   HISTORY
 35869                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35870                                  ;
 35871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35872                                  
 35873                                  skip_token:
 35874                                          call    get_char
 35875                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35876                                          call    any_delim
 35877                                          jne	short skip_token
 35878                                  skip_check_eol:
 35879                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35880                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35881                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35882                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35883                                          clc
 35884                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35885                                  	retn
 35886                                  skip_token_eol:
 35887                                          stc
 35888                                  skip_token_done:
 35889                                          retn
 35890                                  
 35891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35892                                  ;
 35893                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35894                                  ;
 35895                                  ;   INPUT
 35896                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35897                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35898                                  ;
 35899                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35900                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35901                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35902                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35903                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35904                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35905                                  ;
 35906                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35907                                  ;       AX
 35908                                  ;
 35909                                  ;   NOTES
 35910                                  ;       None
 35911                                  ;
 35912                                  ;   HISTORY
 35913                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35914                                  ;
 35915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35916                                  
 35917                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35918                                          call    get_char        ;
 35919                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35920                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35921                                          call    delim           ;
 35922                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35923                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35924                                  
 35925                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35926                                  ;
 35927                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35928                                  ;
 35929                                  ;   INPUT
 35930                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35931                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35932                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35933                                  ;
 35934                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35935                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35936                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35937                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35938                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35939                                  ;
 35940                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35941                                  ;       AX
 35942                                  ;
 35943                                  ;   NOTES
 35944                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35945                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35946                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35947                                  ;
 35948                                  ;   HISTORY
 35949                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35950                                  ;
 35951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35952                                  
 35953                                  skip_opt_line:
 35954                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35955                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35956                                       
 35957                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35958                                  
 35959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35960                                  ;
 35961                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35962                                  ;
 35963                                  ;   INPUT
 35964                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35965                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35966                                  ;
 35967                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35968                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35969                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35970                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35971                                  ;
 35972                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35973                                  ;       AX
 35974                                  ;
 35975                                  ;   NOTES
 35976                                  ;       None
 35977                                  ;
 35978                                  ;   HISTORY
 35979                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35980                                  ;
 35981                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35982                                  
 35983                                  skip_line:
 35984                                          call    get_char
 35985                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35986                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35987                                          jne	short skip_line
 35988                                  skip_line_done:
 35989                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35990                                          retn
 35991                                  
 35992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35993                                  ;
 35994                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35995                                  ;
 35996                                  ;   INPUT
 35997                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35998                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35999                                  ;
 36000                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36001                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36002                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36003                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36004                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36005                                  ;
 36006                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36007                                  ;       AX
 36008                                  ;
 36009                                  ;   NOTES
 36010                                  ;       None
 36011                                  ;
 36012                                  ;   HISTORY
 36013                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36014                                  ;
 36015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36016                                  
 36017                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36018                                  
 36019                                  get_number:
 36020                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36021                                  num_loop:
 36022                                          call    get_char        ;
 36023                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36024                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36025                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36026                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36027                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36028                                          push    ax              ;
 36029                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36030                                          push    dx              ;
 36031                                          mul     bx              ;
 36032                                          pop     dx              ;
 36033                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36034                                          pop     ax              ;
 36035                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36036                                          cbw                     ;
 36037                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36038                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36039                                  
 36040                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36041                                  ;num_done:
 36042                                          ;retn
 36043                                  
 36044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36045                                  ;
 36046                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36047                                  ;
 36048                                  ;   INPUT
 36049                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36050                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36051                                  ;
 36052                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36053                                  ;       AL == next character
 36054                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36055                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36056                                  ;
 36057                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36058                                  ;       AX
 36059                                  ;
 36060                                  ;   NOTES
 36061                                  ;       None
 36062                                  ;
