 36063                                  ;   HISTORY
 36064                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36065                                  ;
 36066                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36067                                  
 36068                                  get_char:
 36069                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36070                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36071                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36072                                  	es	
 36073                                  	lodsb
 36074                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36075                                          retn			;
 36076                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36077                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36078                                  nearby_ret:
 36079                                          retn
 36080                                  
 36081                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36082                                  ;
 36083                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36084                                  ;
 36085                                  ;   INPUT
 36086                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36087                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36088                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36089                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36090                                  ;
 36091                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36092                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36093                                  ;
 36094                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36095                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36096                                  ;
 36097                                  ;   NOTES
 36098                                  ;       None
 36099                                  ;
 36100                                  ;   HISTORY
 36101                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36102                                  ;
 36103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36104                                  
 36105                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36106                                  query_user:
 36107                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36108                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36109                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36110                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36111                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36112                                  qu_1:
 36113                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36114                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36115                                          push    ax                      ;
 36116                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36117                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36118                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36119                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36120                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36121                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36122                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36123                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36124                                  query_all:
 36125                                  
 36126                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36127                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36128                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36129                                  
 36130                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36131                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36132                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36133                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36134                                  
 36135                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36136                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36137                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36138                                  find_match:                             ;
 36139                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36140                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36141                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36142                                          inc     di                      ;
 36143                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36144                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36145                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36146                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36147                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36148                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36149                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36150                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36151                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36152                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36153                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36154                                          inc     di                      ;
 36155                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36156                                          int     21h                     ;
 36157                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36158                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36159                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36160                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36161                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36162                                  cmd_notset:
 36163                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36164                                  line_print:                             ;
 36165                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36166                                          es
 36167                                  	lodsb
 36168                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36169                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36170                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36171                                  non_null:                               ;
 36172                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36173                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36174                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36175                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36176                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36177                                  non_space:                              ;
 36178                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36179                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36180                                          int     21h                     ;
 36181                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36182                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36183                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36184                                  
 36185                                  generic_prompt:
 36186                                          call    print                   ;
 36187                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36188                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36189                                          int     16h                     ;
 36190                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36191                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36192                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36193                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36194                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36195                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36196                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36197                                  not_func:
 36198                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36199                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36200                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36201                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36202                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36203                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36204                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36205                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36206                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36207                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36208                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36209                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36210                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36211                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36212                                  
 36213                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36214                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36215                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36216                                  	clc
 36217                                  do_cmd:
 36218                                  	pop     ax			;
 36219                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36220                                  	; cf=0
 36221                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36222                                  	retn
 36223                                  
 36224                                  skip_cmd:
 36225                                  	pop     ax			;
 36226                                  skip_all:
 36227                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36228                                  	stc
 36229                                  	retn
 36230                                  
 36231                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36232                                  ;
 36233                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36234                                  ;
 36235                                  ;   INPUT
 36236                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36237                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36238                                  ;
 36239                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36240                                  ;       None
 36241                                  ;
 36242                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36243                                  ;       None
 36244                                  ;
 36245                                  ;   NOTES
 36246                                  ;       None
 36247                                  ;
 36248                                  ;   HISTORY
 36249                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36250                                  ;
 36251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36252                                  
 36253                                  print_error:
 36254                                          push    ax
 36255                                          push    bx
 36256                                          push    cx
 36257                                          push    dx
 36258                                          push    ds
 36259                                          push    cs
 36260                                          pop     ds
 36261                                          pushf
 36262                                          call    get_linenum
 36263                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36264                                          call    error_line
 36265                                          popf
 36266                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36267                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36268                                          call    print
 36269                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36270                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36271                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36272                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36273                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36274                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36275                                  pe_1:     
 36276                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36277                                          call    print
 36278                                  pe_ret: 
 36279                                  	pop     ds
 36280                                          pop     dx
 36281                                          pop     cx
 36282                                          pop     bx
 36283                                          pop     ax
 36284                                  	retn
 36285                                  
 36286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36287                                  
 36288                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36289                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36290                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36291                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36292                                  
 36293                                  disable_autoexec:
 36294                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36295                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36296                                  
 36297                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36298                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36299                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36300                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36301                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36302                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36303                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36304                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36305                                  dae_1:
 36306                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36307                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36308                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36309                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36310                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36311                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36312                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36313                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36314                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36315                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36316                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36317                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36318                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36319                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36320                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36321                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36322                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36323                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36324                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36325                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36326                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36327                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36328                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36329                                          retn
 36330                                  
 36331                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36332                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36333                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36334                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36335                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36336                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36337                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36338                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36339                                  
 36340                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36341                                  
 36342                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36343                                  
 36344                                  
 36345                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36346

 36349                                  ; procedure : delim
 36350                                  ;
 36351                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36352                                  
 36353                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36354                                  ;
 36355                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36356                                  ;
 36357                                  ;any_delim:
 36358                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36359                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36360                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36361                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36362                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36363                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36364                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36365                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36366                                  ;
 36367                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36368                                  
 36369                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36370                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36371                                  delim:
 36372 00002FB9 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36373 00002FBB 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36374                                  
 36375 00002FBD 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36376 00002FBF 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36377                                  
 36378                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36379 00002FC1 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36380 00002FC3 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36381 00002FC5 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36382 00002FC7 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36383 00002FC9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36384 00002FCB 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36385 00002FCD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36386 00002FCF 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36387 00002FD1 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36388                                  
 36389                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36390                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36391                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36392 00002FD3 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36393                                  ;endif
 36394                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36395                                  delim_ret:
 36396                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36397 00002FD4 C3                      	retn

 36460                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36461                                  ;
 36462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36463                                  
 36464                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36465                                  mapcase:
 36466 00002FF5 51                      	push	cx
 36467 00002FF6 56                      	push	si
 36468 00002FF7 1E                      	push	ds
 36469                                  
 36470 00002FF8 06                      	push	es
 36471 00002FF9 1F                      	pop	ds
 36472                                  
 36473                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36474                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36475                                  ;
 36476                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36477                                  ;;else
 36478                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36479                                  ;;endif
 36480                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36481 00002FFA 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36482                                  
 36483                                  convloop:
 36484 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 36485 00002FFD 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36486 00002FFF 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36487 00003001 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36488 00003003 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36489 00003005 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36490 00003007 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36491                                  noconv:
 36492                                  
 36493                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36494                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36495                                  ;;
 36496                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36497                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36498                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36499                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36500                                  ;;
 36501                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36502                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36503                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36504                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36505                                  ;check_eol:
 36506                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36507                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36508                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36509                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36510                                  ;;endif
 36511                                  	
 36512                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36513 0000300A E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36514                                  convdone:
 36515 0000300C 1F                      	pop	ds
 36516 0000300D 5E                      	pop	si
 36517 0000300E 59                      	pop	cx
 36518 0000300F C3                      	retn

 36522                                  ; procedure : round
 36523                                  ;
 36524                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36525                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36526                                  ;
 36527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36528                                  
 36529                                  round:
 36530                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36531 00003010 1E                      	push	ds
 36532 00003011 0E                      	push	cs
 36533 00003012 1F                      	pop	ds
 36534                                  
 36535 00003013 50                      	push	ax
 36536                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36537 00003014 A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 36538                                  
 36539 00003017 E88AE0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36540                                  
 36541                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36542 0000301A 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 36543                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36544 0000301E C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 36545                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36546 00003024 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 36547                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36548 00003027 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 36549                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 36550                                  	; 17/09/2023
 36551 0000302B 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 36552                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36553 0000302D F606[1014]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36554 00003032 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36555 00003034 06                      	push	es
 36556 00003035 56                      	push	si
 36557                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36558 00003036 8B36[0E14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 36559 0000303A 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36560 0000303C 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36561 0000303E 48                      	dec	ax
 36562                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36563 0000303F 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36564                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36565 00003043 8026[1014]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36566 00003048 5E                      	pop	si

 36570

 36573                                  
 36574                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36575                                  	; cf = 0
 36576                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36577                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36578 0000304C C3                      	retn

 36624                                  	;cmp	al,9

 36636                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36637                                  ;
 36638                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36639                                  ;
 36640                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36641                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36642                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36643                                  ;
 36644                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36645                                  
 36646                                  getnum:
 36647 00003083 53                      	push	bx
 36648 00003084 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36649                                  b2:
 36650 00003086 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36651 00003089 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36652                                  
 36653 0000308B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36654 0000308C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36655                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36656                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36657 0000308D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36658 0000308F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36659 00003091 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36660 00003092 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36661 00003094 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36662 00003097 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36663                                  
 36664 00003099 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36665                                  
 36666 0000309A E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36667 0000309D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36668 0000309F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36669 000030A1 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36670 000030A3 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36671 000030A5 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36672 000030A7 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36673 000030A9 7417                    	je	short b15
 36674 000030AB 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36675 000030B0 7410                    	je	short b15
 36676 000030B2 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36677                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36678                                  	;nop
 36679                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36680                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36681                                  	;nop
 36682                                  	;nop
 36683 000030B4 740C                    	je	short b15
 36684 000030B6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36685 000030B8 7408                    	je	short b15
 36686 000030BA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36687 000030BC 7404                    	je	short b15
 36688 000030BE 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36689 000030C0 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36690                                  b15:
 36691 000030C2 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36692 000030C7 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36693                                  b1:
 36694 000030CC 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36695 000030CE 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36696 000030D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 36697 000030D1 C3                      	retn
 36698                                  badnum:
 36699                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36700                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36701 000030D2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36702                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36703 000030D4 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36704 000030D8 5B                      	pop	bx
 36705 000030D9 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36706 000030DA C3                      	retn
 36707                                  
 36708                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36709                                  
 36710                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36711                                  
 36712                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36713                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36714                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36715                                  ;	si = 0
 36716                                  ;	ax = country id
 36717                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36718                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36719                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36720                                  ;
 36721                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36722                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36723                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36724                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36725                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36726                                  
 36727                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36728                                  
 36729 000030DB 57                      	push	di
 36730 000030DC 50                      	push	ax
 36731 000030DD 52                      	push	dx
 36732                                  
 36733 000030DE 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36734 000030E0 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36735 000030E2 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36736 000030E5 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36737 000030E8 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36738                                  
 36739 000030EA 06                      	push	es
 36740 000030EB 56                      	push	si
 36741                                  
 36742 000030EC 0E                      	push	cs
 36743 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 36744                                  
 36745 000030EE BF[5233]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36746 000030F1 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36747 000030F4 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36748                                  
 36749 000030F6 5E                      	pop	si
 36750 000030F7 07                      	pop	es
 36751 000030F8 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36752                                  
 36753 000030FA 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36754 000030FD 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36755 00003100 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36756                                  
 36757 00003102 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36758 00003103 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36759 00003105 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36760 00003108 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36761 0000310B E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36762 0000310E 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36763                                  
 36764 00003110 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36765 00003112 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36766 00003116 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36767                                  
 36768 00003118 46                      	inc	si
 36769 00003119 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36770 0000311A 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36771 0000311B 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36772 0000311C 5F                      	pop	di
 36773                                  
 36774                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36775 0000311D 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36776 00003120 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36777                                  
 36778                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36779                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36780                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36781 00003122 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 36782 00003124 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 36783 00003126 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36784 00003129 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36785                                  
 36786                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36787 0000312B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36788 0000312D 46                      	inc	si
 36789 0000312E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36790 0000312F E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36791                                  
 36792                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36793                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36794 00003131 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 36795                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36796 00003132 F9                      	stc
 36797 00003133 C3                      	retn
 36798                                  
 36799                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36800 00003134 5E                      	pop	si
 36801 00003135 59                      	pop	cx
 36802 00003136 5F                      	pop	di
 36803 00003137 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36804                                  
 36805                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36806 00003139 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36807                                  
 36808                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36809 0000313C 2E8916[5A33]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36810 00003141 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36811 00003144 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36812 00003147 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36813 0000314A E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36814 0000314D 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36815                                  
 36816 0000314F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36817 00003151 46                      	inc	si
 36818 00003152 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36819                                  
 36820                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36821 00003153 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36822 00003154 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36823 00003155 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36824                                  
 36825 00003156 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36826 00003159 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36827 0000315C 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36828                                  
 36829 0000315E 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36830 00003161 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36831 00003164 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36832 00003167 F9                      	stc
 36833 00003168 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36834 0000316A 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36835                                  
 36836 0000316C BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36837 0000316F B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36838 00003172 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36839 00003174 F9                      	stc
 36840 00003175 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36841 00003177 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36842                                  
 36843 00003179 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36844 0000317B 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36845                                  
 36846 0000317D 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36847 00003180 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36848 00003183 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36849 00003186 F9                      	stc
 36850 00003187 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36851 00003189 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36852                                  
 36853 0000318B 56                      	push	si
 36854 0000318C BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file

 36969                                  getcountrydestination:
 36970                                  
 36971                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36972                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36973                                  ;
 36974                                  ;input: al - data id
 36975                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36976                                  ;on return:
 36977                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36978                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36979                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36980                                  
 36981                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36982                                  
 36983 00003200 51                      	push	cx
 36984                                  	;add	di,74
 36985 00003201 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36986                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36987 00003204 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36988 00003207 47                      	inc	di
 36989 00003208 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36990                                  
 36991                                  getcntrydest:

 36994

 36997

 37036                                  
 37037                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37038                                  
 37039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37040                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37041                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37042                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37043                                  ;
 37044                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37045                                  ;	 be moved.
 37046                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37047                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37048                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37049                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37050                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37051                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37052                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37053                                  
 37054 0000322B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37055 0000322C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37056 0000322F F9                      	stc
 37057 00003230 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37058 00003232 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37059 00003233 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37060                                  
 37061 00003235 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37062 00003237 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37063 00003239 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37064 0000323B F9                      	stc
 37065 0000323C CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37066                                  ricb_exit:
 37067 0000323E C3                      	retn

 37074                                  
 37075                                  set_country_path:
 37076                                  
 37077                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37078                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37079                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37080                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37081                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37082                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37083                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37085                                  
 37086                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37087                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37088                                  
 37089                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37090                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37091                                  
 37092                                  	push	si
 37093                                  
 37094                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37095                                  	push	es
 37096                                  	pop	ds
 37097                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37098                                  
 37099                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37100                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37101                                  
 37102                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37103                                  	inc	si
 37104                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37105                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37106                                  
 37107                                  scp_default_drv:
 37108                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37109                                  	int	21h
 37110                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37111                                  
 37112                                  scp_setdrv:
 37113                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37114                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37115                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37116                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37117                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37118                                  
 37119                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37120                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37121                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37122                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37123                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37124                                  
 37125                                  scp_root_dir:
 37126                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37127                                  scp_path:
 37128                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37129                                  
 37130                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37131                                  scpath_exit:
 37132                                  
 37133                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37134                                  	push	es
 37135                                  	pop	ds
 37136                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37137                                  
 37138                                  	pop	si
 37139                                  	retn
 37140                                  
 37141                                  %endif
 37142
